S04vimkn_u:338: Vkn 2.7 sa upāyakauśalyena glānam ātmānam upadarśayati sma /
S04vimkn_u:339_0: tasya glānasya vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ rājarājamahāmātrāmātyakumārapāriṣadyā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ
S04vimkn_u:339_1: śreṣṭhinaigamajānapadās tadanyāni ca bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi glānaparipṛcchakāny upasaṃkrāmanti sma /
S04vimkn_u:341: imam eva cāturmahābhautikaṃ kāyam ārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati sma: evam anityo 'yaṃ mārṣāḥ kāyaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:342: evam adhruvaḥ, evam anāsvāsikaḥ, evaṃ durbalaḥ, evam asāraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:377: tatra yuṣmābhir evaṃrūpe kāye nirvidvirāga utpādayitavyas tathāgatakāye ca spṛhotpādayitavyā /
S04vimkn_u:378: Vkn 2.12 dharmakāyo hi mārṣāḥ tathāgatakāyo dānanirjātaḥ śīlanirjātaḥ samādhinirjātaḥ prajñānirjāto vimuktinirjāto vimuktijñānadarśananirjātaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:383: abhijñāvidyānirjātaḥ sarvākuśaladharmaprahāṇāya nirjātaḥ sarvakuśaladharmaparigrahanirjātaḥ satyanirjāto bhūtanirjāto 'pramādanirjātaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:384: apramāṇaśubhakarmanirjāto mārṣās tathāgatakāyas tatra yuṣmābhiḥ spṛhā kartavyā /
S04vimkn_u:385: sarvasatvānāṃ ca sarvakleśavyādhiprahāṇāyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpādayitavyāni /
S04vimkn_u:386_0: Vkn 2.13 evaṃ vimalakīrtir licchavis tathā saṃnipatitānāṃ teṣāṃ glānaparipṛcchakānāṃ
S04vimkn_u:386_1: tathā tathā dharmaṃ deśayati yad bahūni satvaśatasahasrāṇy anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S04vimkn_u:388: Vkn 3.1 atha vimalakīrter licchaver etad abhavat: ahaṃ ca glāna ābādhiko mañcasamārūḍhaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:389: na ca māṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ samanvāharati,
S04vimkn_u:390: na ca me glānaparipṛcchakaṃ kaṃcit preṣayaty anukaṃpām upādāya /
S04vimkn_u:391: Vkn 3.2 samanvāhṛtaś ca bhagavatā vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ /
S04vimkn_u:392: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:393: gaccha tvaṃ śāriputra vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:394: evam ukta āyuṣmāñ śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:395: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:397: abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan: ekasmin samaye 'nyatamasmin vṛkṣamūle pratisaṃlīno 'bhūvam /
S04vimkn_u:398: vimalakīrtiś ca licchavir yena tad vṛkṣamūlaṃ tenopasaṃkramya mām etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:399: Vkn 3.3 na bhadantaśāriputra evaṃ pratisaṃlayanaṃ saṃlātavyaṃ yathā tvaṃ pratisaṃlīnaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:400: api tu tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā traidhātuke na kāyaś cittaṃ vā saṃdṛśyate /
S04vimkn_u:401: tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā nirodhāc ca na vyuttiṣṭhasi sarveryāpatheṣu ca saṃdṛśyase /
S04vimkn_u:402: tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā prāptilakṣaṇaṃ ca na vijahāsi pṛthagjanalakṣaṇeṣu ca saṃdṛśyase /
S04vimkn_u:403: tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā te na cādhyātmaṃ cittam avasthitaṃ bhaven na bahirdhopavicaret /
S04vimkn_u:404: tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā sarvadṛṣṭigatebhyaś ca na calasi saptatriṃśatsu ca bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu saṃdṛśyase /
S04vimkn_u:405: tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā saṃsārāvacarāṃś ca kleśān na prajahāsi nirvāṇasamavasaraṇaś ca bhavasi /
S04vimkn_u:406: ye bhadantaśāriputra evaṃ pratisaṃlayanaṃ pratisaṃlīyante teṣāṃ bhagavān pratisaṃlayanam anujānāti /
S04vimkn_u:407: Vkn 3.4 so 'haṃ bhagavan etāṃ śrutvā tūṣṇīm evābhūvam /
S04vimkn_u:408: na tasya śaknomy uttare prativacanaṃ dātum /
S04vimkn_u:409: tan nāham utsahe tasya kulaputrasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:410: Vkn 3.5 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:411: gaccha tvaṃ maudgalyāyana vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:412: maudgalyāyano 'py āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:415: ekasmin samaye vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryām anyatamasmin vīthīmukhe gṛhapatibhyo dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
S04vimkn_u:416: tatra māṃ vimalakīrtir licchavir upasaṃkrāmyaivam āha:
S04vimkn_u:417: Vkn 3.6 na bhadantamaudgalyāyana gṛhibhyo 'vadātavasanebhya evaṃ dharmo deśayitavyo yathā bhadanto deśayati /
S04vimkn_u:418: api tu tathā bhadantamaudgalyāyana dharmo deśayitavyo yathaiva sa dharmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:446: Vkn 3.7 īdṛśasya bhadantamahāmaudgalyāyana dharmasya kīdṛśī deśanā /
S04vimkn_u:449: yatra bhadantamaudgalyāyana asamāropapadaṃ na tatra deśyate na śrūyate na vijñāyate /
S04vimkn_u:451: Vkn 3.8 evaṃ hi cittāvasthānena dharmo deśayitavyaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:453: sudṛṣṭaprajñādarśanena mahākaruṇāmukhībhūtena mahāyānasaṃvarṇakena buddhekṛtajñena śuddhāśayena dharmaniruktividhijñena,
S04vimkn_u:455: Vkn 3.9 tena bhagavan tathā tathā dharmo deśito yathā tato gṛhapatiparsado 'ṣṭānāṃ gṛhapatiśatānām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni /
S04vimkn_u:457: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:458: Vkn 3.10 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:459: gaccha tvaṃ mahākāśyapa vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:460: mahākāśyapo 'py āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:462: abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan daridravīthyāṃ piṇḍāya carāmi /
S04vimkn_u:463: tatra māṃ vimalakirtir licchavir upasaṃkramyaivam āha:
S04vimkn_u:466: api tu bhadantamahākāśyapa dharmasamatāpratiṣṭhitena te bhavitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:482: Vkn 3.13 yadi sthaviro mahākāśyapo 'ṣṭau ca mithyātvāni samatikrāmet,
S04vimkn_u:486: sarvabuddhān sarvāryāṃś ca pratipādya paścād ātmanā paribhuñjīta,
S04vimkn_u:487: tathā ca paribhuñjīta yathā na saṃkleśo na vigatakleśaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:490: ye ca bhadantāya piṇḍapātaṃ dadati te teṣāṃ nālpaphalaṃ na mahāphalaiḥ bhavet /
S04vimkn_u:491: na ca hānāya na viśeṣāya gacchet, buddhagatisamavasaraṇāya ca bhaveta na śrāvakagatisamavasaraṇāya /
S04vimkn_u:493: Vkn 3.14 so 'haṃ bhagavan imaṃ dharmanirdeśaṃ śrutvāścaryaprāptaḥ sarvabodhisatvān namasyāmi /
S04vimkn_u:494: gṛhiṇo 'pi nāmaivaṃrūpaṃ pratibhānam, ko 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ notpādayet /
S04vimkn_u:495: tataḥ prabhṛti me na kaścit satvaḥ śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne vā samādāpitapūrvo 'nyatra mahāyānāt /
S04vimkn_u:496: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya kulaputrasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:497: Vkn 3.15 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:498: gaccha tvaṃ subhūte vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:499: subhūtir apy āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:501: abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan: ekasmin samaye vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ piṇḍāya carāmi /
S04vimkn_u:503: tasya me vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ pātraṃ gṛhītvā praṇītena bhojanena pratipūryaivam āha:
S04vimkn_u:504: Vkn 3.16 sacet tvaṃ bhadantasubhūte āmiṣasamatayā sarvadharmasamatām anugataḥ sarvadharmasamatayā ca buddhadharmasamatām anugata eva,
S04vimkn_u:506: sacet tvaṃ bhadantasubhūte na rāgadoṣamohaprahīṇo na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvasasi /
S04vimkn_u:507: saced evam asy avikopya satkāyam ekāyanaṃ mārgam anugataḥ /
S04vimkn_u:508: na ca te 'vidyā bhavatṛṣṇā ca samudghātitā na ca vidyāvimuktī utpādite /
S04vimkn_u:511: na ca te catvāry āryasatyāni dṛṣṭāni na ca na dṛṣṭasatyaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:515: Vkn 3.17 na ca te śāstā dṛṣṭo na dharmaḥ śruto na saṃghaḥ paryupāsitaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:516: ye ca te ṣaṭ śāstāras tadyathā pūraṇaḥ kāśyapaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:522: te ca bhadantasya śāstāras tāṃś ca niśritya pravrajito yadgāminas te ṣaṭ śāstāras tadgāmy evāryasubhūtiḥ,
S04vimkn_u:523: Vkn 3.18 sarvadṛṣṭigateṣu cāryaman antargato na cāntamadhyaprāptaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:524: aṣṭākṣaṇasamavasaraṇaś cāsi na cāsi lakṣaṇam anuprāptaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:526: yā ca sarvasatvānām araṇā sā bhadantasyāpy araṇā,
S04vimkn_u:528: ye ca bhadantāya piṇḍapātaṃ dadati tāṃś ca vinipātayasi,
S04vimkn_u:529: sarvamāraiś ca te sārdham ekahastaḥ kṛtaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:538: Vkn 3.19 tasya me bhagavan imaṃ dharmanirdeśaṃ śrutvāndhakāraprāptā diśo 'bhūvan ḥ tat kim asmai nirdiśāmi,
S04vimkn_u:540: so 'haṃ tat pātram utsṛjya tato gṛhān niṣkramiṣyāmīti /
S04vimkn_u:541: vimalakīrtir Iicchavir mām evam āha: mā bhadantasubhūte akṣarebhya uttrasīḥ, pratigṛhāṇedaṃ pātram /
S04vimkn_u:542: tat kiṃ manyase bhadantasubhūte, yadi tathāgatanirmita evam ucyeta kaccit sa uttraset /
S04vimkn_u:544: sa mām evam āha: nirmitamāyāsvabhāvebhyo bhadantasubhūte sarvadharmebhyo nottrasitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:546: sarvāṇi hi tāni vacanāni tatsvabhāvāni, evaṃ paṇḍitā akṣareṣu na sajjanti na tebhya uttrasyanti /
S04vimkn_u:548: sarvāṇi tāny akṣarāṇy anakṣarāṇi sthāpayitvā vimuktiṃ vimuktilakṣaṇāṃś ca sarvadharmān /
S04vimkn_u:549: Vkn 3.20 iha nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne dvayor devaputraśatayor virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśuddham,
S04vimkn_u:550: pañcānāṃ ca devaputraśatānām ānulomikyāḥ kṣānteḥ pratilambho 'bhūt /
S04vimkn_u:551: ahaṃ ca niṣpratibhāno 'bhūvam, na cāsya śaknomy uttare prativacanaṃ dātum /
S04vimkn_u:552: tan nāham utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:553: Vkn 3.21 atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ maitrāyaṇīputram āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:554: gaccha tvaṃ pūrṇa vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:555: pūrṇo 'py āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:558: ekasmin samaye vanasyānyatamasmin pṛthivīpradeśa ādikarmikāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
S04vimkn_u:559: tatra vimalakīrtir licchavir upasaṃkramya mām evam āha:
S04vimkn_u:560: Vkn 3.22 samāpadya bhadantapūrṇa eteṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ cittaṃ vyavalokya dharmaṃ deśaya /
S04vimkn_u:562: jāniṣva tāvat kimāśayā ete bhikṣava iti /
S04vimkn_u:564: mā bhadantapūrṇa apratyavekṣyā satvendriyeṣu prādeśikendriyatvam upasaṃhārṣīḥ /
S04vimkn_u:570: api bhadantapūrṇa sarve hy ete bhikṣavo mahāyānasaṃprasthitā amuṣitabodhicittāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:573: jātyandhā iva me śrāvakāḥ pratibhānti satvendriyavimātratājñāne /
S04vimkn_u:574: Vkn 3.23 atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma /
S04vimkn_u:575: yathā te bhikṣavo 'nekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsam anusmaraṇti sma /
S04vimkn_u:576: te pañcabuddhaśataparyupāsitakuśalamūlāḥ samyaksaṃbodhaye, teṣāṃ tad bodhicittam āmukhībhūtam /
S04vimkn_u:577: te tasya satpuruṣasya pādau śirobhiḥ praṇamya tatraiva niṣaṇṇāḥ prāñjalayo bhūtvā,
S04vimkn_u:578: teṣāṃ tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yathāvaivartikāḥ saṃvṛttā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04vimkn_u:579: Vkn 3.24 tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:580: Vkn 3.25 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ kātyāyanam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:581: gaccha tvaṃ kātyāyana vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:582: kātyāyano 'py āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:584: abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan: bhagavatā saṃkṣiptena bhikṣūṇām avavādo dattaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:586: yad idam anityārthaṃ duḥkhārtham anātmārthaṃ śāntārtham /
S04vimkn_u:587: tatra vimalakīrtir licchavir upasaṃkramya mām evam āha:
S04vimkn_u:588: Vkn 3.26 mā bhadantakātyāyana sapracārām utpādabhaṅgayuktāṃ dharmatāṃ nirdiśa /
S04vimkn_u:589: yo bhadantamahākātyāyana atyantatayā na jāto na janiṣyati notpanno na niruddho na nirotsyate 'yam anityārthaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:595: Vkn 3.27 asmin khalu punar nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni /
S04vimkn_u:596: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:597: Vkn 3.28 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam aniruddham āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:598: gaccha tvam aniruddha vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:599: aniruddho 'py āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:601: Vkn 3.29 abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan: anyatamasmiṃś caṅkrame caṅkramāmi /
S04vimkn_u:602: tatra śubhavyūho nāma brahmā daśabhir brahmasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ taṃ pradeśam avabhāsya yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya mama pādau śirasābhivandyaikānte sthitvā mām etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:603: kiyad āyuṣmān aniruddho divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati /
S04vimkn_u:605: ahaṃ mārṣa imaṃ triṃ sāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ bhagavataḥ śākyamuner buddhakṣetraṃ tad yathāpi nāma karatale nyastam āmalakaphalam evaṃ paśyāmi /
S04vimkn_u:606: Vkn 3.30 iyaṃ ca kathā pravṛttā vimalakīrtiś ca licchavis taṃ pradeśam upasaṃkrāmat /
S04vimkn_u:607: upasaṃkramya mama pādau śirasā vanditvaivam āha:
S04vimkn_u:608: kiṃ bhadantāniruddha divyaṃ cakṣur abhisaṃskāralakṣaṇam utānabhisaṃskāralakṣaṇam /
S04vimkn_u:609: yady abhisaṃskāralakṣaṇaṃ tad bāhyaiḥ pañcābhijñaiḥ samam,
S04vimkn_u:610: athānabhisaṃskāralakṣaṇaṃ anabhisaṃskāro 'saṃskṛtas tena na śakyaṃ draṣṭum /
S04vimkn_u:613: Vkn 3.31 sa ca brahmā tasya satpuruṣasyemaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvāścaryaprāptas taṃ namaskṛtyaitad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:616: buddhā bhagavanto loke divyacakṣuṣo ye samāhitāvasthāṃ ca na vijahati sarvabuddhakṣetrāṇi ca paśyanti /
S04vimkn_u:618: Vkn 3.32 atha sa brahmemaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā daśasahasraparivāro 'dhyāśayenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayati sma /
S04vimkn_u:619: sa māṃ vanditvā taṃ ca satpuruṣam abhivādya tatraivāntarhitaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:621: tan nāham utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:622: Vkn 3.33 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam upālim āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:623: gaccha tvam upāle vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:624: upālir apy āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:626: abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan: anyatamau dvau bhikṣū āpattim āpannau,
S04vimkn_u:628: tau yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntāv upasaṃkrāmya mām etad avocatām /
S04vimkn_u:630: tāv āvāṃ paryapatrapamāṇau bhagavantam upasaṃkramituṃ notsahāvahe /
S04vimkn_u:631: utsāhāya āyuṣmann upāle vinodayasvāvayoḥ kaukṛtyaṃ vyutthāpayasvāvām āpatteḥ /
S04vimkn_u:632: Vkn 3.34 so 'haṃ bhagavaṃs tau bhikṣū dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayāmi /
S04vimkn_u:633: vimalakīrtiś ca licchavis taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ sa mām etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:636: na hi bhadantopāle āpattir adhyātmapratiṣṭhitā na bahirdhāsaṃkrānto nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate /
S04vimkn_u:638: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā cittasaṃkleśāt satvāḥ saṃkliśyante cittavyavadānād viśudhyante /
S04vimkn_u:639: cittaṃ ca bhadantopāle nādhyātmapratiṣṭhitaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate /
S04vimkn_u:640: yathā cittaṃ tathāpattiḥ, yathāpattis tathā sarvadharmāḥ, tathatāṃ na vyativartante /
S04vimkn_u:641: yā bhadantopāle cittasya prakṛtir yayā cittaprakṛtyā bhadantasya cittaṃ vimuktam,
S04vimkn_u:653: ye tv evaṃ jānanti te vinayadharā ity ucyante /
S04vimkn_u:655: Vkn 3.36 atha tau bhikṣu etad avocatām: prajñādharo vinayadharo 'yam upāsakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:656: na tv ayaṃ bhadantopālir yo bhagavatā vinayadharāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:657: tāv aham evaṃ vadāmi: mā bhikṣū atra gṛhapatisaṃjñām utpādayatām /
S04vimkn_u:659: tathāgataṃ sthāpayitvā nāsti kaścic chrāvako vā bodhisatvo vā, ya etasya pratibhānam ācchindyāt /
S04vimkn_u:661: Vkn 3.37 atha tau bhikṣū vinītakaukṛtyāv adhyāśayena tatraivānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpāditavantau,
S04vimkn_u:662: taṃ ca satpuruṣam abhivandyaivam āhatuḥ: sarvasatvā īdṛśasya pratibhānasya lābhino bhavantu /
S04vimkn_u:663: tan nāham utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:664: Vkn 3.38 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ rāhulam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:665: gaccha tvaṃ rāhula vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:666: rāhulo 'py āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:669: ekasmin samaye saṃbahulā licchavikumārakā yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya mām etad avocan:
S04vimkn_u:670: tvaṃ rāhula tasya bhagavataḥ putraś cakravartirājyam utsṛjya pravrajitaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:672: teṣām ahaṃ yathārūpaṃ pravrajyāyā guṇānuśaṃsā nirdiśāmi,
S04vimkn_u:675: Vkn 3.39 na bhadantarāhula evaṃ pravrajyāyā guṇānuśaṃsā nirdeṣṭavyā yathā tvaṃ nirdiśasi /
S04vimkn_u:679: pravrajyā cāsaṃskṛtā, asaṃskṛte ca na guṇā nānuśāṃsā /
S04vimkn_u:703: Vkn 3.40 pravrajata yūyaṃ kumārakāḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye /
S04vimkn_u:704: durlabho hi buddhotpādaḥ, durlabhā kṣaṇasaṃpat, durlabho manuṣyapratilambhaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:705: te kumārakā evam āhuḥ: śrutam asmābhir gṛhapate,
S04vimkn_u:707: sa tān āha: utpādayata yūyaṃ kumārakāḥ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam /
S04vimkn_u:708: pratipattyā ca saṃpādayata, saiva yuṣmākaṃ bhaviṣyati pravrajyā sopasaṃpat /
S04vimkn_u:709: Vkn 3.41 tatra dvātriṃśatā licchavikumārair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni /
S04vimkn_u:710: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:711: Vkn 3.42 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:712: gaccha tvam ānanda vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:713: ānanda āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:715: abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan: ekasmin samaye bhagavataḥ kāyasya kaścid evābādhaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:717: so 'ham anyatamasmin brāhmaṇamahāśālasya gṛhamūle pātraṃ gṛhītvā sthitaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:718: vimalakīrtir licchavis taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ / sa māṃ vanditvaivam āha:
S04vimkn_u:719: Vkn 3.43 kiṃ bhadantānanda kālyam eva pātram ādāyāsmin gṛhadvārasamīpe tiṣṭhasi /
S04vimkn_u:720: tam enam aham etad avocam: bhagavato gṛhapate kāyasya kaścid evābādhaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:721: tatra ca kṣīreṇa kṛtyam, tat paryeṣāmi /
S04vimkn_u:722: sa mām evam āha: alaṃ bhadantānanda mā evaṃ vocaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:723: vajrasaṃhatano hi bhadantānanda tathāgatakāyaḥ sarvākuśalavāsanāprahīṇaḥ sarvamahaujaskakuśaladharmasamanvāgataḥ /
S04vimkn_u:728: mā mahaujaskā devaputrā anyabuddhakṣetrasaṃnipatitāś ca bodhisatvāḥ śroṣyanti /
S04vimkn_u:729: rājñas tāvad bhadantānanda cakravartina itvarakuśalamūlasamanvāgatasya vyādhir na saṃvidyate /
S04vimkn_u:736: kīdṛśo bata ayam eṣāṃ śāstā yaḥ svayam eva tāvad ātmānaṃ glānaṃ na śaknoti paritrātum,
S04vimkn_u:737: kutaḥ punar glānānāṃ satvānāṃ trāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:740: Vkn 3.45 api tu bhadantānanda dharmakāyās tathāgatā nāmiṣakāyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:744: tasya bhadanto vyādhim icchatīty ayuktam asadṛśam /
S04vimkn_u:745: Vkn 3.46 tasya me bhagavan mahadapatrāpyaṃ jātam /
S04vimkn_u:746: mā me bhagavato 'ntikād duḥśrutaṃ durgṛhītaṃ vā kṛtam iti /
S04vimkn_u:748: evam etad ānanda yathā gṛhapatir nirdiśati /
S04vimkn_u:749: atha ca punaḥ pañcakaṣāye bhagavān utpannaḥ, tenānarthalūhadaridracaryayā satvā vinetavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:750: tad gaccha tvam ānanda kṣīraṃ gṛhītvā, mā paryapatrapaś ceti /
S04vimkn_u:751: Vkn 3.47 īdṛśā bhagavan vimalakīrter licchaveḥ praśnavyākaraṇanirdeśāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:752: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya kulaputrasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:753: Vkn 3.48 evaṃ tāni pañcamātrāṇi śrāvakaśatāny anutsahamānāni bhagavate nivedayanti /
S04vimkn_u:754: ye ca tair vimalakīrtinā licchavinā sārdhaṃ kathāsaṃlāpāḥ kṛtās tān sarvān bhagavate nivedayanti sma /
S04vimkn_u:755: Vkn 3.49 tatra bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisatvam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:756: gaccha tvaṃ maitreya vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:757: maitreyo 'py āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:760: ekasmin samaye saṃtuṣitena devaputreṇa sārdhaṃ tuṣitakāyikaiś ca devaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ dharmyāṃ kathāṃ kathayāmi yad idaṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānām avivartyāṃ bhūmim ārabhya /
S04vimkn_u:761: tatra ca vimalakīrtir licchavis taṃ pradeśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:763: Vkn 3.50 tvaṃ maitreya ekajātipratibaddho bhagavatā vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04vimkn_u:764: tat katamayāsi maitreya jātyāu vyākṛtaḥ, kim atītayā vānāgatayota pratyutpannayā /
S04vimkn_u:765: tatra yātītā jātiḥ sā kṣīṇā, yāpy anāgatā sāpy asaṃprāptā, pratyutpannāyāḥ sthitir nāsti jāteḥ /
S04vimkn_u:767: tathā hi tvaṃ bhikṣaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe jāyase jīryasi mriyase cyavase upapadyase ceti /
S04vimkn_u:771: Vkn 3.51 tat kathaṃ tvaṃ maitreya vyākṛtas tathatotpādena tathatānirodhena vā /
S04vimkn_u:772: na ca tathatotpadyate na nirudhyate, na nirotsyate /
S04vimkn_u:773: yā ca sarvasatvānāṃ tathatā, yā ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatā, saiva maitreyasyāpi tathatā /
S04vimkn_u:774: evaṃ yadi tvaṃ vyākṛtaḥ sarvasatvā api vyākṛtā bhavanti /
S04vimkn_u:778: sarvasatvā api tasmin samaye tādṛśīm eva bodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante /
S04vimkn_u:781: yadā ca maitreyaḥ parinirvāsyati, sarvasatvā api tadā parinirvāsyanti /
S04vimkn_u:783: na hy aparinirvṛtānāṃ sarvasatvānāṃ tathāgatāḥ parinirvānti /
S04vimkn_u:785: tasmād iha maitreya mā etān devaputrān ullāpaya mā visaṃvādaya /
S04vimkn_u:786: Vkn 3.52 na bodhau kaścit pratiṣṭhate, na nivartate /
S04vimkn_u:787: api tu khalu punar maitreya yaiṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ bodhiparikalpanadṛṣṭis tām etām utsarjaya /
S04vimkn_u:788: na hi bodhiḥ kāyenābhisaṃbudhyate, na cittena /
S04vimkn_u:806: na deśasthā na pradeśasthā bodhiḥ sthānāsthānavigatā,
S04vimkn_u:808: nāmadheyamātraṃ bodhis tac ca nāma nirīhakam,
S04vimkn_u:817: sā na śakyā kāyena vācā cittenābhisaṃboddhum /
S04vimkn_u:818: Vkn 3.53 iha bhagavan nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne tataḥ pariṣado dvayor devaputraśatayor anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilambho 'bhūt /
S04vimkn_u:820: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:821: Vkn 3.54 tatra bhagavān prabhāvyūhaṃ licchavikumāram āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:822: gaccha tvaṃ satpuruṣa vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:823: prabhāvyūho 'py āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:825: abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan: ekasmin samaye bhagavan vaiśālyā mahānagaryā niṣkramāmi /
S04vimkn_u:827: so 'haṃ tam abhivādyaivam avocam: kutas tvaṃ gṛhapate āgacchasīti /
S04vimkn_u:828: sa mām evam āha: āgacchāmi bodhimaṇḍād iti /
S04vimkn_u:829: tam aham etad avocam: bodhimaṇḍa iti kasyaitan nāma /
S04vimkn_u:831: Vkn 3.55 bodhimaṇḍa iti kulaputra āśayamaṇḍa eṣo 'kṛtrimatayā,
S04vimkn_u:863_0: Vkn 3.60 iti hi kulaputra yāvanto bodhisatvāḥ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ satvaparipākapratisaṃyuktaṃ
S04vimkn_u:863_1: saddharmaparigrahapratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalamūlapratisaṃyuktaṃ kramam utkṣipanti nikṣipanti ca /
S04vimkn_u:864: sarve te bodhimaṇḍād āgacchanti, buddhadharmebhya āgacchanti, buddhadharmeṣu ca pratiṣṭhante /
S04vimkn_u:865: Vkn 3.61 iha bhagavan nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne pañcamātrair devamanuṣyaśatair bodhāya cittāny utpāditāni /
S04vimkn_u:867: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:868: Vkn 3.62 tatra bhagavān jagatindharaṃ bodhisatvam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:869: gaccha tvaṃ jagatindhara vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:870: jagatindharo 'py āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:872: abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan: ekasmin samaye svake vihāre viharāmi /
S04vimkn_u:873_0: atha māraḥ pāpīyān dvādaśabhir apsaraḥsahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ śakraveṣeṇa tūryasaṃgītisaṃpravāditena
S04vimkn_u:873_1: yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya mama pādau śirasā vanditvā saparivāro māṃ puraskṛtyaikānte 'sthāt /
S04vimkn_u:874: tam enam ahaṃ jānāmi ḥ śakra eṣa devendra iti /
S04vimkn_u:875: tam aham etad avocam: svāgataṃ te kauśika,
S04vimkn_u:878: sa mām evam āha: pratīccha tvaṃ satpuruṣa imāni dvādaśāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi mamāntikāt,
S04vimkn_u:880: tam aham etad avocam: mā tvaṃ kauṣika akalpikena vastunā śramaṇān śākyaputrīyān nimantraya,
S04vimkn_u:881: yathā na hy etā asmākaṃ kalpyanta iti /
S04vimkn_u:882: Vkn 3.63 eṣā ca kathā pravṛttā, vimalakīrtir licchavir upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:883: sa mām evam āha: mā atra kulaputra śakrasaṃjñām utpādaya /
S04vimkn_u:884: māra eṣa pāpīyāṃs tava viheṭhanābhiprāya upasaṃkrāntaḥ, naiṣa śakra iti /
S04vimkn_u:885: atha vimalakīrtir licchavis taṃ māraṃ pāpīyāṃsam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:887: asmākam etāḥ kalpyante, na śramaṇānāṃ śākyaputrīyāṇām iti /
S04vimkn_u:888: atha māraḥ pāpīyān bhītas trastaḥ saṃvignaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:891: na ca śaknoti sarvarddhim api darśayitvāntardhātum /
S04vimkn_u:892: so 'ntarīkṣāc chabdam aśrauṣīt: niryātaya tvam etāḥ pāpīyan apsarasa etasmai satpuruṣāya,
S04vimkn_u:894: atha māro bhītas trasto 'kāmako 'smai tā apsaraso niryātayati /
S04vimkn_u:895: Vkn 3.64 pratigṛhya ca vimalakīrtis tā apsarasa etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:898: sa tāsāṃ tadānulomikīṃ bodhiparipācanīṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā bodhau cittam utpādayati sma /
S04vimkn_u:899: sa tā evam āha: utpāditam idānīṃ yuṣmābhir bodhicittam,
S04vimkn_u:938: Vkn 3.65 atha māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tā apsarasa etad avocat: āgacchata /
S04vimkn_u:940: tā evam āhuḥ: niryātitā idānīṃ tvayā vayam asmai gṛhapataye /
S04vimkn_u:941: dharmārāmaratiratābhir asmābhir idānīṃ bhavitavyam, na kāmaratiratābhiḥ /
S04vimkn_u:942: atha māraḥ pāpīyān vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim evam āha: niḥsṛja tvaṃ gṛhapate imā apsarasaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:947: atha tā apsaraso vimalakīrtiṃ namaskṛtyaivam āhuḥ: kathaṃ vayaṃ gṛhapate mārabhavane 'vatiṣṭhema /
S04vimkn_u:948: Vkn 3.66 āha: asti bhaginyaḥ akṣayapradīpaṃ nāma dharmamukham /
S04vimkn_u:951: tadyathā bhaginyaḥ ekasmāt tailapradīpād dīpaśatasahasrāṇy ādīpyante /
S04vimkn_u:952: na ca tasya dīpasya parihāṇir bhavati /
S04vimkn_u:953: evam eva bhaginyaḥ eko bodhisatvo bahūni satvaśatasahasrāṇi bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati /
S04vimkn_u:954: na ca tasya bodhisatvasya cittasmṛtir hīyate, na parihīyate, uta ca vardhate /
S04vimkn_u:955: evaṃ sarvān kuśalān dharmān yathā yathā pareṣām ārocayati deśayati,
S04vimkn_u:956: tathā tathā vivardhate sarvaiḥ kuśalair dharmaiḥ /
S04vimkn_u:958: tatra yuṣmābhir mārabhavane sthitābhir aparimāṇānāṃ devaputrāṇām apsarasāṃ ca bodhicittaṃ rocayitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:961: Vkn 3.67 atha tā apsaraso vimalakīrter licchaveḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā sārdhaṃ māreṇa prakrāntāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:962: ime bhagavan vimalakīrter licchaver vikurvaṇaviśeṣāḥ, yān ahaṃ nājñāsiṣam /
S04vimkn_u:963: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:964: Vkn 3.68 tatra bhagavān sudattaṃ śreṣṭhiputram āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:965: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:966: sudatto 'py āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:968: abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan: svake paitṛke niveśane mahāyajñaṃ yajāmi /
S04vimkn_u:971: tatra saptame divase vimalakīrtir licchavis tāṃ mahāyajñaśālāṃ praviśya mām etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:972: na śreṣṭhiputra evaṃ yajño yaṣṭavyo yathā tvaṃ yajase /
S04vimkn_u:975: tam aham etad avocam: kathaṃ punar dharmayajño yaṣṭavyaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:977: Vkn 3.69 yena dharmayajñenāpūrvācaramaṃ sarvasatvāḥ paripācyante, ayaṃ dharmayajñaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1013: yatra dharmayajñe pratiṣṭhitā bodhisatvā iṣṭayajñayājūkā dakṣiṇīyā bhavanti sadevakasya lokasya /
S04vimkn_u:1014: evaṃ hi bhagavan tasya gṛhapater nirdiśatas tasyā brāhmaṇaparṣado dvayor brāhmaṇaśatayor anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni /
S04vimkn_u:1015: Vkn 3.75 ahaṃ cāścaryaprasādapratilabdhas tasya satpuruṣasya caraṇau praṇamya śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ kaṇṭhād avatārya dadāmi /
S04vimkn_u:1016: sa taiḥ muktāhāraṃ na pratigṛhṇāti sma /
S04vimkn_u:1017: tam aham etad avocam: pratigṛhyemam, yatra te prasādo bhavati tasmai prayaccheti /
S04vimkn_u:1019: eko bhāgo yas tatra yajñaśālāyāṃ sarvalokajugupsito nagaradaridras tasmai dattaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1020: dvitīyaś ca bhāgo duṣprasahāya tathāgatāya dattaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1021_0: yathā ca sarvā parṣat paśyati taṃ ca marīciṃ lokadhātuṃ taṃ ca duṣprasahaṃ tathāgataṃ
S04vimkn_u:1021_1: taṃ ca muktāhāraṃ duṣprasahasya mūrdhasaṃdhau muktāhārakūṭāgāraṃ prādurbhūtaṃ citraṃ
S04vimkn_u:1022: Vkn 3.76 sa idaṃ prātihāryaṃ saṃdarśyemāṃ vācam abhāṣata:
S04vimkn_u:1023: yasya dāyakasya dānapater yādṛśī tathāgate dakṣiṇīyasaṃjñā tādṛśī nagaradaridre nirnānātvena samā,
S04vimkn_u:1026: Vkn 3.77 tatrāsau nagaradaridra idaṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā,
S04vimkn_u:1029: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:1030: Vkn 3.78 iti hi sarve te bodhisatvā mahāsatvāḥ svakasvakān nirdeśān nirdiśanti sma,
S04vimkn_u:1031: ye caiṣāṃ tena satpuruṣeṇa sārdham antarākathāsamudāhārā abhūvan,
S04vimkn_u:1034: Vkn 4.1 tatra bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:1035: gaccha tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1036: mañjuśrīr apy āha: kiṃ cāpi durāsado 'sau bhagavan vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1050: atha ca punar gamiṣyāmi buddhādhiṣṭhānena, tatra yathāśakti yathābalaṃ nirdekṣyāmi /
S04vimkn_u:1051: Vkn 4.2 atha tataḥ parṣadas teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ teṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca śakrabrahmalokapālānāṃ teṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
S04vimkn_u:1053: yatra mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sa ca satpuruṣa ubhau saṃlapiṣyataḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1054: tatrāṣṭau ca bodhisatvasahasrāṇi pañcamātrāṇi ca śrāvakaśatāni saṃbahulāś ca śakrabrahmalokapālāḥ saṃbahulāni ca devaputraśatasahasrāṇi mañjuśriyam anubaddhāni dharmaśravaṇāya /
S04vimkn_u:1055: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtas tair bodhisatvair mahāsatvais taiś ca śrāvakais taiś ca śakrabrahmalokapālair devaputraiś ca parivṛto vaiśālīṃ mahānagarīṃ praviśati sma /
S04vimkn_u:1056: Vkn 4.3 atha vimalakīrter etad abhavat: ayaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta āgacchati mahatā parivāreṇa /
S04vimkn_u:1057: yan nv ahaṃ śūnyaṃ gṛham adhitiṣṭheyam /
S04vimkn_u:1058: tena taṃ gṛhaṃ śūnyam adhiṣṭhitam apagatadvārapālam /
S04vimkn_u:1059: na tatra mañcā vā pīṭhā vāsanāni vā saṃdṛśyante 'nyatraikasmān mañcāt,
S04vimkn_u:1061: Vkn 4.4 atha mañjuśrīḥ saparivāro yena vimalakīrter niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04vimkn_u:1063: sa taṃ gṛhaṃ śūnyam apaśyad vigatadvārapālam /
S04vimkn_u:1064: na cātra mañcān vā pīṭhān vāpaśyad anyatraikamañcāt, yatra vimalakīrtiḥ śayitaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1065: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam adrākṣīt /
S04vimkn_u:1068: mañjuśrir āha: evam etad gṛhapate yathā vadasi /
S04vimkn_u:1069: ya āgato na sa bhūya āgamiṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:1070: yaś ca gato na sa bhūyo gamiṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:1072: na cāgatasyāgamanaṃ prajñāyate, na ca gatasya gamanam, yaś ca dṛṣṭo na bhūyo draṣṭavyaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1073: Vkn 4.5 api tu kaccit te satpuruṣa kṣapaṇīyam,
S04vimkn_u:1078: alpātaṅkatāṃ cālpaglānyatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yatrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca /
S04vimkn_u:1079: Vkn 4.6 kutra te gṛhapate idaṃ vyādhisamutthānam /
S04vimkn_u:1083: yāvacciram upādāya mañjuśrīḥ avidyā bhavatṛṣṇā ca tāvacciram upādāya mamaiṣa vyādhiḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1084: yadā ca sarvasatvā vigatavyādhayo bhaviṣyanti tadā mama vyādhiḥ praśrabdho bhaviṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:1088: yadā sarvasatvā vigatavyādhayo bhaviṣyanti tadā bodhisatvo 'rogo bhaviṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:1089: Vkn 4.7 tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ śreṣṭhina ekaputrako glāno bhavet /
S04vimkn_u:1091: tāvac ca duḥkhitau bhavetāṃ yāvan nāsāv ekaputrakas tayor vigatavyādhiḥ syāt /
S04vimkn_u:1093: sa satvaglānyena glāno bhavati, satvārogyāt tv arogaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1094: yat punar mañjuśriḥ evaṃ vadasi ḥ kutaḥ samutthito vyādhir iti,
S04vimkn_u:1096: Vkn 4.8 mañjuśrīr āha: śūnyaṃ te gṛhapate gṛham / na ca te kaścid upasthāyakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1103: āha: yenāpi parikalpyeta tad api śūnyam / na ca śūnyatā śūnyatāṃ parikalpayati /
S04vimkn_u:1105: āha: śūnyatā mañjuśrīḥ dvāṣaṣṭibhyo dṛṣṭigatebhyo mārgitavyā /
S04vimkn_u:1106: āha: dvāṣaṣṭiḥ punar dṛṣṭigatāni kuto mārgitavyāni /
S04vimkn_u:1110: yat punar mañjuśrīḥ evaṃ vadasi ḥ kas ta upasthāyaka iti /
S04vimkn_u:1118: Vkn 4.9 mañjuśrīr āha: kidṛśo 'yaṃ te gṛhapate vyādhiḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1120: āha: kim eṣa vyādhiḥ kāyasaṃprayukta uta cittasaṃprayuktaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1121: āha: na kāyasaṃprayuktaḥ kāyaviviktatayā / na cittasaṃprayukto māyādharmatayā cittasya /
S04vimkn_u:1123: katame catvāraḥ, yad uta pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur iti /
S04vimkn_u:1125: āha: ya evaṃ dhātuko mañjuśrīḥ sarvasatvānāṃ vyādhis tenāhaṃ vyādhitaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1126: Vkn 4.10 api tu khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ kathaṃ bodhisatvena glānako bodhisatvaḥ pratisaṃmoditavyaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1127: mañjuśrīr āha: kāyānityatayā na ca nirvidvirāgatayā,
S04vimkn_u:1141: Vkn 4.11 mañjuśrīr āha: kathaṃ kulaputra bodhisatvena glānena svacittaṃ nidhyapayitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:1142: vimalakīrtir āha: iha mañjuśrīḥ bodhisatvena glānenaivaṃ svacittaṃ nidhyapayitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:1144: na punar atra kaścit paramārthato dharma upalabhyate yasyaiṣa vyādhiḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1147: na caiṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ kaścit svāmī na samutthāpayitā /
S04vimkn_u:1149: yo 'yaṃ vyādhir nāma nāyaṃ paramārthata upalabhyate, anyatrātmābhiniveśāt /
S04vimkn_u:1155: te ca dharmāḥ parasparaṃ na cetayanti na jānanti /
S04vimkn_u:1156: na ca teṣām utpadyamānānām evaṃ bhavaty utpadyāmaha iti /
S04vimkn_u:1157: na nirudhyamānānām evaṃ bhavati nirudhyāmaha iti /
S04vimkn_u:1158: Vkn 4.12 tena dharmasaṃjñāyā evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:1163: tatra katamad vyādhiprahāṇam, yad idam ahaṃkāramamakāraprahāṇam /
S04vimkn_u:1164: tac ca katamad ahaṃkāramamakāraprahāṇam, yad idaṃ dvayavigamaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1165: tatra katamo dvayavigamaḥ, yad idam adhyātmaṃ bahirdhā ca samudācāraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1166: tatra katamo 'dhyātmaṃ bahirdhā samudācāraḥ, yad uta samatayācalanatāpracalanatā /
S04vimkn_u:1170: ubhe 'py ete śūnye, yad utātmā nirvāṇaṃ ca /
S04vimkn_u:1173: ubhāv apy etāv apariniṣpannau, yad utātmā nirvāṇaṃ ca /
S04vimkn_u:1174: tena samadarśinā nānyo vyādhir nānyā śūnyatā kartavyā /
S04vimkn_u:1176: Vkn 4.13 aviditā ca sā vedanā veditavyā /
S04vimkn_u:1179: na ca durgatyupapannānāṃ satvānām antike mahākaruṇā notpādayitavyā /
S04vimkn_u:1180: tathā kariṣyāmo yathaiṣāṃ satvānām evam ayoniśonidhyaptyā vyādhim apaneṣyāmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1181: Vkn 4.14 na caiṣāṃ kaṃcid dharmam upaneṣyāmo nāpaneṣyāmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1182: yato nidānāc ca punar vyādhir utpadyate tasya parijñāyai tebhyo dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1183: katamac ca punar nidānam, yad idam adhyālambananidānam /
S04vimkn_u:1186: tasyādhyālambanatayā kā parijñā, yad idam ālambanānupalambhaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1188: kiṃ ca nopalabhate, ubhe dṛṣṭī nopalabhate, yad idam ātmadṛṣṭiṃ paradṛṣṭiṃ ca /
S04vimkn_u:1190: evaṃ hi mañjuśrīḥ glānena bodhisatvena svacittaṃ nidhyapayitavyaṃ jarāvyādhimaraṇopapattiprahāṇāya /
S04vimkn_u:1191: evaṃ ca mañjuśrīḥ bodhisatvānāṃ bodhir yadi na bhavet, nirarthako nanu vyāyāmo bhavet /
S04vimkn_u:1193: evam eva jarāvyādhimaraṇaduḥkhopaśamanād bodhisatvā ity ucyante /
S04vimkn_u:1195: yathā mama vyādhir abhūto 'sann evaṃ sarvasatvānām api vyādhir abhūto 'sann iti /
S04vimkn_u:1199: anuśaṃsadṛṣṭipatitayaiva hi mahākaruṇayā bodhisatvasya khedo bhavaty upapattiṣu /
S04vimkn_u:1200: anuśaṃsadṛṣṭiparyutthānavigatayā punar mahākaruṇayā bodhisatvasya khedo na bhavaty upapattiṣu /
S04vimkn_u:1201: so 'yam upapadyate, na ca dṛṣṭiparyutthānaparyutthita upapadyate /
S04vimkn_u:1202: so 'paryutthitacitta upapadyamāno mukta evotpadyate mukta eva jāyate /
S04vimkn_u:1203: sa mukta evotpadyamāno mukta eva jāyamāno baddhānāṃ satvānāṃ śaktaḥ pratibalo bandhamokṣāya dharmaṃ deśayitum /
S04vimkn_u:1204: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā sa tāvad ātmanā baddhaḥ paraṃ bandhanān mocayiṣyatīti nādaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate /
S04vimkn_u:1205: yas tv ātmanā muktaḥ paraṃ bandhanān mocayiṣyatīti sthānam etad vidyate tasmān muktena bodhisatvena bhavitavyam, na baddhena /
S04vimkn_u:1206: Vkn 4.16 tatra katamo bandhaḥ, katamo mokṣaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1207: anupāyād bhavagatiparigraho bodhisatvasya bandhaḥ, upāyād bhavagatigamanaṃ mokṣaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1208: anupāyād dhyānasamādhyāsvādanatā bodhisatvasya bandhaḥ, upāyena dhyānasamādhyāsvādanatā mokṣaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1209: anupāyasaṃgṛhītā prajñā bandhaḥ, upāyasaṃgṛhītā prajñā mokṣaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1210: prajñayāsaṃgṛhīta upāyo bandhanam, prajñāsaṃgṛhīta upāyo mokṣaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1222: yad idaṃ sarvadṛṣṭikleśaparyutthānānuśayānunayapratighaprahīṇasya sarvakuśalamūlārambho bodhau pariṇāmitas tasya cāparāmarśaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1224: Vkn 4.18 tatra mañjuśrīḥ glānena bodhisatvenaivam ime dharmā nidhyapayitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1225: yatl kāyasya cittasya ca vyādheś cānityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmapratyavekṣaṇā, iyam asya prajñā /
S04vimkn_u:1229: punar aparaṃ yat kāyasya vyādheś cittasya cānyonyaparāparatāṃ na nirnavatāniḥpurāṇatāṃ pratyavekṣate, iyam asya prajñā /
S04vimkn_u:1230: yat punaḥ kāyasya vyādheś cittasya ca nātyantopaśamaṃ nirodham atyayati, ayam asyopāyaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1231: Vkn 4.19 evaṃ hi mañjuśriḥ glānena bodhisatvena cittaṃ nidhyapayitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:1232: na ca tena nidhyaptau vānidhyaptau vā sthātavyam /
S04vimkn_u:1234: yadi hy anidhyaptau tiṣṭhed bāladharma eṣaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1238: Vkn 4.20 yan na pṛthagjanagocaro nāryagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1239: yat saṃsāragocaraś ca na ca kleśagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1240: yan nirvāṇapratyavekṣaṇagocaraś ca na cātyantaparinirvāṇagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1241: yac caturmārasaṃdarśanagocaraś ca sarvamāraviṣayātikrāntagocaraś ca, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1242: yat sarvajñajñānaparyeṣṭigocaraś ca na cākāle jñānaprāptigocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1243: yac catuḥsatyajñānagocaraś ca na cākāle satyaprativedhagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1246: yad ajātipratyavekṣaṇagocaraś ca na ca niyāmāvakrāntigocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1247: yat pratītyasamutpādagocaraś ca sarvadṛṣṭivigatagocaraś ca, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1248: yat sarvasatvasaṃgaṇikāgocaraś ca na ca kleśānuśayagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1249: yad vivekagocaraś ca na ca kāyacittakṣayaniśrayagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1250: yat traidhātukagocaraś ca na ca dharmadhātusaṃbhedagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1251: yac chūnyatāgocaraś ca sarvākāraguṇaparyeṣṭigocaraś ca, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1252: yad ānimittagocaraś ca satvapramocanārambaṇavitarkagocaraś ca, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1253: yad apraṇihitagocaraś ca saṃcintyabhavagatisaṃdarśanagocaraś ca, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1256: yat ṣaṭpāramitāgocaraś ca sarvasatvacittacaritapāragamanagocaraś ca, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1257: yat ṣaḍanusmṛtigocaraś ca na ca sarvāsravakṣayagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1258: yat saddharmapratiṣṭhānagocaraś ca na ca kumārgādhyālambanagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1259: yat ṣaḍabhijñāgocaraś ca na cāsravakṣayagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1260: yac caturapramāṇagocaraś ca na ca brahmalokopapattisparśanagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1261: yad dhyānasamādhisamāpattigocaraś ca na ca samādhisamāpattivaśenopapattigocaraḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1263: yat smṛtyupasthānagocaraś ca na ca kāyavedanācittadharmātyarthagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1264: yat samyakprahāṇagocaraś ca na ca kuśalākuśaladvayopalambhagocaraḥ, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1265: yad ṛddhipādābhinirhāragocaraś cānābhogarddhipādavaśavartigocaraś ca, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1266: yat pañcendriyagocaraś ca sarvasatvendriyaparāparajñānagocaraś ca, ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1285: iha nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne ye mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena sārdham āgatā devaputrās tato 'ṣṭānāṃ devaputrasahasrāṇām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni // //
S04vimkn_u:1287: Vkn 5.1 athāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitad abhavat: kutreme bodhisatvā niṣatsyanti,
S04vimkn_u:1290: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetovitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:1293: Vkn 5.2 āha: tena hi bhadantaśāriputra yo dharmarthiko bhavati, nāsau svakāyārthiko bhavati /
S04vimkn_u:1302: Vkn 5.3 punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra yo dharmārthikaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1303: nāsau duḥkhaparijñānārthiko na samudayaprahāṇārthiko na nirodhasākṣātkriyārthiko na mārgabhāvanārthiko bhavati /
S04vimkn_u:1306: tatra yaḥ prapañcayati ḥ duḥkhaṃ parijñāsyāmi samudayaṃ prahāsyāmi nirodhaṃ sākṣātkariṣyāmi mārgaṃ bhāvayiṣyāmīti,
S04vimkn_u:1310: tatra ya utpādavyaye caranti, na te dharmārthikā na vivekārthikāḥ, utpādavyayārthikās te /
S04vimkn_u:1312: tatra ye kvacid dharme rakṣante 'ntaśo nirvāṇe 'pi, na te dharmārthikāḥ, rajo'rthikās te /
S04vimkn_u:1314: ye viṣayasaṃkhyātāḥ, na te dharmārthikāḥ, viṣayārthikās te /
S04vimkn_u:1316: ye kecid dharmaṃ gṛhṇanti vā muñcanti vā, na te dharmārthikāḥ, udgrahaniḥsargārthikās te /
S04vimkn_u:1318: ya ālayārāmāḥ, na te dharmārthikāḥ, ālayārthikās te /
S04vimkn_u:1320: yeṣāṃ nimittānusārivijñānam, na te dharmārthikāḥ, nimittārthikās te /
S04vimkn_u:1322: ye kecid dharmeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃvasanti, na te dharmārthikāḥ, saṃvāsārthikās te /
S04vimkn_u:1324: ye dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñāteṣu caranti, na te dharmārthikāḥ, dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātārthikās te /
S04vimkn_u:1326: ye saṃskṛtagocarāḥ, na te dharmārthikāḥ, saṃskṛtodgrahaṇārthikās te /
S04vimkn_u:1327: tasmād iha bhadantaśāriputra dharmārthikena te bhavitukāmena sarvadharmānarthikena bhavitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:1328: iha dharmanirdeśe nirdiśyamāne pañcānāṃ devaputraśatānāṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśuddham /
S04vimkn_u:1329: Vkn 5.6 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:1330: tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ daśasu dikṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhakṣetraśatasahasreṣu buddhakṣetracārikāṃ carasi /
S04vimkn_u:1331: tat katarasmin buddhakṣetre tvayā sarvaviśiṣṭāni sarvaguṇopetāni siṃhāsanāni dṛṣṭāni /
S04vimkn_u:1332: evam ukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:1333: asti kulaputra pūrve digbhāge ṣaṭtriṃśadgaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy atikramya merudhvajā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1334: tatra merupradīparājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati /
S04vimkn_u:1339: merudhvajāyāṃ lokadhātau tasya bhagavato merupradīparājasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sarvaviśiṣṭāni sarvagunopetāni siṃhāsanāni /
S04vimkn_u:1340: Vkn 5.7 atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samanvāhāraṃ samanvāharati sma /
S04vimkn_u:1342: yat tato merudhvajālokadhātor dvātriṃśatsiṃhāsanaśatasahasrāṇi tena bhagavatā merupradīparājena tathāgatena preṣitāni /
S04vimkn_u:1343: tāvad udviddhāni tāvad vistīrṇāni tāvad darśanīyāni yad apūrvāṇi tair bodhisatvais taiś ca mahāśrāvakais taiś ca śakrabrahmalokapālair devaputraiś ca /
S04vimkn_u:1344: tāny upary antarīkṣeṇāgatya vimalakirter licchaver niveśane pratyatiṣṭhan /
S04vimkn_u:1345: tac ca gṛhaṃ tāvad vistīrṇaṃ saṃdṛśyate,
S04vimkn_u:1347: na ca vaiśālyā mahānagaryā āvaraṇaṃ kṛtam, na jambūdvīpasya, na cāturdvīpikasyāvaraṇam /
S04vimkn_u:1348: sarve te tathaiva saṃdṛśyante yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt /
S04vimkn_u:1349: Vkn 5.8 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:1350: niṣida tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ siṃhāsane sārdham etair bodhisatvaiḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1351: tādṛśāṃś cātmabhāvān adhitiṣṭhata yat siṃhāsaneṣv anurūpāḥ syuḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1352: atha ye 'bhijñāpratilabdhā bodhisatvās te dvācatvāriṃśadyojanaśatasahasram ātmabhāvam adhiṣṭhāya teṣu siṃhāsaneṣu nisīdanti sma /
S04vimkn_u:1353: ye cādikarmikā bodhisatvās te na śaknuvanti sma teṣu siṃhāsaneṣu niṣattum /
S04vimkn_u:1354: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:1356: āha: na śaknomi satpuruṣa niṣattum uccāni pragṛhitāni cemāni siṃhāsanāni /
S04vimkn_u:1357: āha: tena hi bhadantaśāriputra tasyaiva bhagavato merupradīparājasya tathāgatasya namaskāraṃ kuru /
S04vimkn_u:1359: atha te mahāśrāvakās tasya bhagavato merupradīparājasya tathāgatasya namaskāraṃ kurvanti sma /
S04vimkn_u:1360: te tatra paścāt teṣu siṃhāsaneṣu nyaṣīdan /
S04vimkn_u:1361: Vkn 5.9 athāyuṣmāñ śāriputro vimalakirtiṃ licchavim evam āha:
S04vimkn_u:1362: āścaryaṃ kulaputra yad ihaivaṃ parītte gṛha imānīyanti siṃhāsanasahasrāṇy evam uccāny evaṃ pragṛhītāni vicitrāṇi /
S04vimkn_u:1363: na ca vaiśālyā mahānagaryā āvaraṇaṃ kṛtam,
S04vimkn_u:1368: tathaiva saṃdṛśyante yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt /
S04vimkn_u:1370: asti bhadantaśāriputra tathāgatānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ cācintyo nāma vimokṣaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1371: yatrācintyavimokṣe pratiṣṭhito bodhisatvaḥ sumeruṃ parvatarājaṃ tāvad uccaṃ tāvat pragṛhītaṃ tāvad udviddhaṃ tāvad vistīrṇaṃ sarṣapaphalakośe praveśayet /
S04vimkn_u:1375: na cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśato vā jānīran ḥ kasmin vayaṃ prakṣiptāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1376: anye ca satvā ṛddhivineyā jānīyuḥ paśyeyus taṃ sumeruṃ parvatarājaṃ sarśapaphalakośapraviṣṭam /
S04vimkn_u:1377: ayaṃ bhadantaśāriputra bodhisatvānām acintyasya vimokṣasya viṣayapraveśaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1378: Vkn 5.11 punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra acintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvo yaś caturṣu mahāsamudreṣv apskandhas tam ekasmin romakūpe prakṣipet /
S04vimkn_u:1379: na ca matsyakacchapaśiśumāramaṇḍūkānām anyeṣāṃ vaudakānāṃ prāṇināṃ pīḍā bhavet /
S04vimkn_u:1380: na ca nāgayakṣagandharvāsurāṇām evaṃ bhavet ḥ kasmin vayaṃ prakṣiptāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1382: na ca kaścit satvo vihiṃsito viheṭhito vā bhavet /
S04vimkn_u:1383: Vkn 5.12 imaṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ bhārgavacakram iva parigṛhya dakṣiṇe pāṇāv avabhrāmya gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān lokadhātūn kṣipet /
S04vimkn_u:1384: na ca satvā jānīran ḥ kasmin vayaṃ nītāḥ, kuto vāgatā iti /
S04vimkn_u:1388: Vkn 5.13 punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra santi satvā apramāṇasaṃsāravainayikāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1390: tatrācintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvo 'pramāṇasaṃsāravainayikānāṃ satvānāṃ vainayikavaśam upādāya saptarātraṃ kalpam atikrāntam ādarśayet /
S04vimkn_u:1391: saṃkṣiptasaṃsāravainayikānāṃ satvānāṃ vainayikavaśam upādāya kalpaṃ saptarātram atikrāntam ādarśayet /
S04vimkn_u:1392: tatrāpramāṇasaṃsāravineyāḥ satvāḥ saptarātraṃ kalpam atikrāntaṃ saṃjānīran I saṃkṣiptasaṃsāravineyāḥ satvāḥ kalpaṃ saptarātram atikrāntaṃ saṃjānīran /
S04vimkn_u:1393: Vkn 5.14 iti hy acintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvaḥ sarvabuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān ekasmin buddhakṣetre saṃdarśayati /
S04vimkn_u:1394: sarvasatvān api dakṣiṇe karatale pratiṣṭhāpya cittajāyikayarddhyā kramet /
S04vimkn_u:1397: yāvatyaś ca daśasu dikṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūjā vartante, tāḥ sarvā ekaromakūpa ādarśayet /
S04vimkn_u:1398: yāvantaś ca daśasu dikṣu candrasūryās tārārūpāni ca, tāny api sarvāṇy ekaromakūpa ādarśayet /
S04vimkn_u:1399: yāvatyaś ca daśasu dikṣu vātamaṇḍalyaḥ pravānti, tā api sarvā mukhadvāre praveśayet /
S04vimkn_u:1401: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre tṛṇavanaspatayo nameyuḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1402: Vkn 5.15 yāni ca daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetrāṇy uddahyante kalpoddāhena,
S04vimkn_u:1403: tad api sarvam agniskandhaṃ svamukhe prakṣipet /
S04vimkn_u:1404: yac ca tena karma kartavyaṃ bhavet, tac ca kuryāt /
S04vimkn_u:1405: yac cāvastād gaṅgānadīvālikākoṭīsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣv atikramya buddhakṣetram,
S04vimkn_u:1406: tad abhyutkṣipyordhaṃ digbhāgaṃ gaṅgānadīvālikākoṭīsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet /
S04vimkn_u:1407: tadyathāpi nāma balavān puruṣaḥ sūcyagreṇa badarīpatram utkṣipet /
S04vimkn_u:1408: Vkn 5.16 evam acṃtyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvāni cakravartyādirūpāṇy adhitiṣṭhet /
S04vimkn_u:1409: Vkn 5.17 yāvantaś ca daśasu dikṣu śabdāvabhāsāḥ śabdaprajñāptayaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1410: tāḥ sarvā hīnamadhyaviśiṣṭānāṃ satvānāṃ sarvabuddhaghoṣarutaracitāny adhitiṣṭhan,
S04vimkn_u:1412: yāvadbhiś cākāranirdeśair daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S04vimkn_u:1414: Vkn 5.18 ayaṃ bhadantaśāriputra acintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ yatkiṃcinmātro viṣayāvatāranirdeśaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1415: api tu kalpam ahaṃ bhadantaśāriputra kalpāvaśesaṃ vācintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ viṣayānāṃ viṣayāvatāranirdeśaṃ nirdiśeyam, ato vottari /
S04vimkn_u:1416: Vkn 5.19 atha khalu sthaviro mahākāśyapa imaṃ bodhisatvānām acintyavimokṣaṃ śrutvāścaryaprāptaḥ sthaviraṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:1417: tadyathāpi nāma āyuṣmañ śāriputra jātyandhasya puruṣasya purastāt kaścid eva sarvarūpagatāny upadarśayet /
S04vimkn_u:1418: na ca tatra sa jātyandha ekarūpam api paśyet /
S04vimkn_u:1419: evam eva āyuṣmañ śāriputra ihācintyavimokṣe nirdiśyamāne sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā iha jātyandhā iva cakṣurvihīnā ekasminn apy acintyakāraṇe na pratyakṣāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1420: ko nāma vidvān imam acintyaṃ vimokṣaṃ śrutvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ notpādayet /
S04vimkn_u:1421: tat kiṃ nu bhūyaḥ kariṣyāmo 'tyantopahatendriyā dagdhavinaṣṭānīva bījāny abhājanībhūtā iha mahāyāne /
S04vimkn_u:1422: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair imaṃ dharmanirdeśaṃ śrutvā rudadbhis trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur vijñāpayitavyaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1423: sarvabodhisatvaiś ca pramuditair imam acintyavimokṣaṃ śrutvā mūrdhnā saṃpratyetavyaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1426: imaṃ nirdeśaṃ nirdiśataḥ sthavirasya mahākāśyapasya dvātriṃśatā devaputrasahasrair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni /
S04vimkn_u:1427: Vkn 5.20 atha vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ sthaviraṃ mahākāśyapam evam āha:
S04vimkn_u:1428: yāvanto bhadantamahākāśyapa daśasu dikṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu mārā māratvaṃ kārayanti,
S04vimkn_u:1429: sarve te yadbhūyasācintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitā bodhisatvā upāyakauśalyena satvaparipācanāya māratvaṃ kārayanti /
S04vimkn_u:1430_0: yāvadbhir bhadantamahākāśyapa daśasu dikṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisatvā yācanakair
S04vimkn_u:1430_1: yācyante hastapādān vā karṇanāsaṃ vā śoṇitaṃ snāyuṃ vāsthimajjānaṃ vā netrāṇi vottamāṅgāni
S04vimkn_u:1430_2: śirāṃsi vāṅgapratyaṅgāni vā rājyarāṣṭrajanapadān vā bhāryāputraduhitṝr vā dāsadāsīr
S04vimkn_u:1432: sarve te yācanakā yadbhūyasācintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitā bodhisatvā upāyakauśalyenemāṃ dṛḍhādhyāśayatāṃ darśayanti /
S04vimkn_u:1434: ugratapaso hi bhadantamahākāśyapa bodhisatvās ta evaṃ darśayanti /
S04vimkn_u:1436: tadyathāpi nāma bhadantamahākāśyapa na śaktir asti khadyotakasya sūryamaṇḍalaprabhām abhibhavitum /
S04vimkn_u:1437: evam eva bhadantamahākāśyapa na śaktir asti prākṛtasya janasya bodhisatvenānavakāśakṛtasyopasaṃkramituṃ yācituṃ vā /
S04vimkn_u:1438: tadyathā bhadantamahākāśyapa yo hastināgasya prahāro na sa śakyo gardabhena soḍhum /
S04vimkn_u:1439: evam eva bhadantamahākāśyapa na śakyam abodhisatvena bodhisatvasyotpīḍanaṃ soḍhum /
S04vimkn_u:1443: Vkn 6.1 atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:1445: āha: tadyathāpi nāma mañjuśrīḥ vijñapuruṣa udakacandram avekṣeta,
S04vimkn_u:1447: tadyathāpi nāma mañjuśrīḥ ādarśamaṇḍale mukhamaṇḍalam ālokayet,
S04vimkn_u:1449: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ marīcikāyām udakam, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvā avekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1450: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ māyākāro māyākāranirmitaṃ puruṣam avekṣeta,
S04vimkn_u:1452: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ pratiśrutkāyā rutaghoṣaḥ, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvā avekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1453: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ gagane 'bhrakūṭam, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1454: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ phenapiṇḍasya pūrvāntaḥ, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1455: tadyathā mañjuśriḥ udakabudbudānām utpādavyayaḥ, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1456: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ kadalyāḥ sāradarśanam, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1457: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ vidyutaḥ saṃkrāntiḥ, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1460: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ saptamam āyatanam, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1461: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ ārūpyeṣu rūpāvabhāsaḥ, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1464: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ maṇḍūkaromapravāraḥ, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1465: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ mṛtasya kāmakrīḍāratiḥ, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1466: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ srotaāpannasya satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1467: tadyathā mañjuśriḥ sakṛdāgāminas tṛtīyo bhavaḥ, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1468: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ anāgāmino garbhāvakrāntiḥ, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1469: tadyathā mañjuśriḥ arhataḥ rāgadoṣamohāḥ, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1472: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ tathāgatasya kleśavāsanā, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1475: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ nirodhasamāpannasyāśvāsāḥ, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1476: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ ākāśe śakunipadam, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1479: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ bandhyāyāḥ putrapratilambhaḥ, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1480: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ tathāgatanirmitasyānutpannāḥ kleśāḥ, evaṃ bodhisatvena
S04vimkn_u:1484: tadyathā mañjuśriḥ aparikalpayataḥ kleśāḥ, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1485: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ anupādānasyāgneḥ saṃbhavaḥ, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1486: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ parinirvṛtasya pratisaṃdhiḥ, evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1487: evaṃ hi mañjuśrīr bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1488: Vkn 6.2 āha: yadi kulaputraivaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ,
S04vimkn_u:1489: kathaṃ punar asya mahāmaitrī bhavati sarvasatveṣu /
S04vimkn_u:1490: āha: yadā mañjuśrīḥ bodhisatva evaṃ pratyavekṣate,
S04vimkn_u:1491: mayā hy eṣāṃ satvānām evaṃ dharmaparijñāyai dharmo deśayitavya iti,
S04vimkn_u:1523: Vkn 6.3 āha: katarā punar asya mahākaruṇā /
S04vimkn_u:1524: āha: yat kṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasatvebhya utsṛjati /
S04vimkn_u:1526: āha: yad datvāttamanā bhavati, na vipratisārī /
S04vimkn_u:1530: āha: saṃsārabhayabhītena mañjuśriḥ bodhisatvena buddhamāhātmyaṃ pratipattavyam /
S04vimkn_u:1535: Vkn 6.5 āha: sarvasatvapramokṣaṃ kartukāmena kiṃ kartavyam /
S04vimkn_u:1537: āha: kleśān utsraṣṭukāmena kathaṃ prayuktena bhavitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:1538: āha: kleśān utsraṣṭukāmena yoniśaḥ prayuktena bhavitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:1539: āha: kathaṃ prayuktaḥ punar yoniśaḥ prayukto bhavati /
S04vimkn_u:1541: āha: kiṃ notpādayati, kiṃ na nirodhayati /
S04vimkn_u:1542: āha: akuśalaṃ notpādayati, kuśalaṃ na nirodhayati /
S04vimkn_u:1545: āha: satkāyasya ca punaḥ kiṃ mūlam /
S04vimkn_u:1554: āha: yan mañjuśrīḥ apratiṣṭhānaṃ tasya kiṃ mūlaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:1556: Vkn 6.7 atha yā tatra gṛhe devatā prativasati,
S04vimkn_u:1557: sā teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānām imaṃ dharmanirdeśaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭodagrāttamanā,
S04vimkn_u:1558: audārikam ātmabhāvaṃ saṃdarśya divyaiḥ puṣpais tān mahāsatvāṃs tāṃś ca mahāśrāvakān abhyavakirati sma /
S04vimkn_u:1559: abhyavakīrṇānāṃ ca tatra yāni bodhisatvānāṃ kāye puṣpāṇi patitāni, tāni dharaṇitale pratiṣṭhitāni /
S04vimkn_u:1560: yāni punar mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ kāye puṣpāṇi patitāni, tāni tatraiva sthitāni na bhūmau patitāni /
S04vimkn_u:1561: tatas te mahāśrāvakā ṛddhiprātihāryaiḥ tāni puṣpāṇy utsṛjanti, na ca patanti /
S04vimkn_u:1562: Vkn 6.8 atha sā devatāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram evam āha: kiṃ bhadantaśāriputra,
S04vimkn_u:1564: āha: akalpikāni devate etāni puṣpāṇi / tasmād aham etāni puṣpāṇy apanayāmi /
S04vimkn_u:1569: tathā hy etāni puṣpāṇi na kalpayanti na vikalpayanti /
S04vimkn_u:1570: sthaviraḥ punaḥ śāriputraḥ kalpayati vikalpayati ca /
S04vimkn_u:1571: ye bhadantaśāriputra svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāṃ kalpayanti vikalpayanti ca, te 'kalpikāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1573: ye punar na kalpayanti na vikalpayanti, te kalpikāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:1574: paśya bhadantaśāriputra eṣāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ kāye puṣpāṇi na śliṣyanti /
S04vimkn_u:1576: tadyathāpi nāma bhīrukajātīyasya puruṣasyāmanuṣyā avatāraṃ Iabhante /

S04vimkn_u:2085: Vkn 9.10 tatra vimalakirtir navatisiṃhāsanasahasrāṇy adhitiṣṭhati yādṛśāny eva tāni prathamakāni siṃhāsanāni /
S04vimkn_u:2087: sa ca nirmitas tad bhojanaparipūrṇaṃ bhājanaṃ vimalakīrter licchaver upanāmayati sma /
S04vimkn_u:2088: tasya bhojanasya gandhena sarvā vaiśālī mahānagarī nirdhūpitābhūd yāvat sāhasro lokadhātuḥ sugandhagandhīkṛto 'bhūt /
S04vimkn_u:2089_0: tatra vaiśālakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ somacchatraś ca nāma licchavīnām adhipatis taṃ
S04vimkn_u:2090: tenaiva ca bhojanagandhena bhūmāvacarā devaputrāḥ kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devāḥ saṃcoditā vimalakīrter licchaver gṛham upasaṃkrāntā abhūvan /
S04vimkn_u:2091: Vkn 9.11 atha vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ sthaviraṃ śāriputraṃ tāṃś ca mahāśrāvakān etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2093: mā ca pradeśacaryāyāṃ cittam upanibandhata, mā na śakyata dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayitum /
S04vimkn_u:2094: Vkn 9.12 tatra keṣāṃcic chrāvakāṇām etad abhavat:
S04vimkn_u:2095: ita evaṃ parīttād bhojanāt katham iyam īdṛśī parṣat paribhokṣyata iti /
S04vimkn_u:2096: tān sa nirmito bodhisatvaḥ śrāvakān etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2097: mā yūyam āyuṣmantaḥ svaprajñāpuṇyais tathāgataprajñāpuṇyāni samīkārṣṭa /
S04vimkn_u:2098: syāc caturṇāṃ mahāsamudrāṇāṃ kṣayaḥ, na tv evāsya bhojanasya kaścit parikṣayaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2099: sacet sarvasatvā api sumerumātrair ālopaiḥ kalpaṃ paribhuñjīran, tathāpy asya kṣayo na syāt /
S04vimkn_u:2101: akṣayaśīlasamādhiprajñānirjātasyedaṃ tathāgatasya pātrāvaśeṣaṃ bhojanaṃ naitac chakyaṃ kṣapayitum /
S04vimkn_u:2102: Vkn 9.13 atha tato bhojanāt sarvā sā parṣat tṛptā kṛtā /
S04vimkn_u:2104: yaiś ca bodhisatvaiḥ śrāvakaiḥ śakrabrahmalokapālais tadanyaiś ca satvais tad bhojanaṃ bhuktam,
S04vimkn_u:2105: teṣāṃ tādṛśaṃ sukhaṃ kāye 'vakrāntaṃ yādṛśaṃ sarvasukhapratimaṇḍite lokadhātau bodhisatvānāṃ sukham /
S04vimkn_u:2106: sarvaromakūpebhyaś ca teṣāṃ tādṛśo gandhaḥ pravāti /
S04vimkn_u:2107: tadyathāpi nāma tasminn eva sarvagandhasugandhe lokadhātau vṛkṣāṇāṃ gandhaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2108: Vkn 9.14 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir jānann eva tān bhagavato gandhottamakūṭasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrād āgatān bodhisatvān etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2110: ta evam āhuḥ: na sa tathāgato 'kṣaraniruktyā dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04vimkn_u:2111: tenaiva gandhena te bodhisatvā vinayaṃ gacchanti /
S04vimkn_u:2112: yatra yatraiva gandhavṛkṣe te bodhisatvā niṣīdanti,
S04vimkn_u:2113_0: tatas tatas tādṛśo gandhaḥ pravāti yat samanantarāghrāte gandhe sarvabodhisatvaguṇākaraṃ
S04vimkn_u:2113_1: nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhante yasya samādheḥ samanantarapratilambhāt sarveṣāṃ bodhisatvaguṇā jāyante /
S04vimkn_u:2114: Vkn 9.15 atha te bodhisatvā vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocan:
S04vimkn_u:2115: iha punar bhagavāñ śākyamuniḥ kīdṛśīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ prakāśayati /
S04vimkn_u:2117: teṣāṃ durdamānāṃ satvānāṃ khaṭuṅkadurdamadamathakathām eva prakāśayati /
S04vimkn_u:2118: katamaḥ punaḥ khaṭuṅkadurdamānāṃ damathaḥ, katamā ca khaṭuṅkadurdamadamathakathā /
S04vimkn_u:2147: ayaṃ prātimokṣaśikṣāvyatikramaḥ, ayaṃ prātimokṣaḥ, idaṃ karaṇīyam, idam akaraṇīyam, ayaṃ yogaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2168: ity evam anekadharmaparibhāṣaṇatayā khaṭuṅkāśvasadṛśacittāḥ satvā avasthāpyante /
S04vimkn_u:2169: tadyathā khaṭuṅko hayo gajo vā yāvan marmavedhena damathaṃ gacchati,
S04vimkn_u:2170: evam eveha durdamāḥ khaṭuṅkāḥ satvās te sarvaduḥkhaparibhāṣaṇakathābhir damathaṃ gacchanti /
S04vimkn_u:2172: āścaryaṃ bhagavataḥ śākyamuner yatra hi nāma pratisaṃhṛtya buddhamāhātmyaṃ daridralūhatayā khaṭuṅkān satvān vinayati /
S04vimkn_u:2173: ye 'pi bodhisatvā ihaivaṃ pratikaṣṭe buddhakṣetre prativasanti teṣām apy acintyā mahākaruṇā /
S04vimkn_u:2174: vimalakīrtir āha: evam eva satpuruṣāḥ tathaitad yathā vadatha /
S04vimkn_u:2175: ye 'pīha bodhisatvāḥ pratyājātāḥ, dṛḍhā teṣāṃ mahākaruṇā /
S04vimkn_u:2176: te bahutaram iha lokadhātāv ekajanmanā kariṣyanti satvārtham /
S04vimkn_u:2177: na tv eva tatra sarvagandhasugandhe lokadhātau kalpasahasreṇa satvārthaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2179: iha hi satpuruṣāḥ sahe lokadhātau daśa kuśaloccayā dharmāḥ,
S04vimkn_u:2193: imān daśa kuśaloccayān dharmān pratigṛhṇanti ye tadanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu na saṃvidyante /
S04vimkn_u:2195: katamair dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvo 'kṣaṭo 'nupahataḥ sahāl lokadhātoś cyutvā pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ gacchati /
S04vimkn_u:2197: aṣṭābhiḥ kulaputraḥ dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvaḥ sahāl lokadhātoś cyutvākṣaṭo 'nupahataḥ pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ gacchati /
S04vimkn_u:2199: yad uta sarvasatvānāṃ mayā hitaṃ kartavyam,
S04vimkn_u:2200: na caiṣāṃ sakāśāt kiṃcid dhitaṃ paryeṣitavyam,
S04vimkn_u:2201: sarvasatvaduḥkhaṃ cānenotsoḍhavyaṃ sarvaṃ cānena kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasatvānām utsraṣṭavyam,
S04vimkn_u:2204: aśrutānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ śrutānāṃ ca śravaṇād apratikṣepaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:2207: ebhir aṣṭābhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvaḥ sahāl lokadhātoś cyutvākṣaṭo 'nupahataḥ pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ gacchati /
S04vimkn_u:2208_0: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśrīś ca kumārabhūtas tasyāṃ parṣadi saṃnipatitāyāṃ
S04vimkn_u:2208_1: tathā dharmaṃ deśayato yathā paripūrṇasya prāṇisahasrasyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni,
S04vimkn_u:2211: Vkn 10.1 tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavata āmrapālīvane dharmaṃ deśayataḥ sa maṇḍalamāḍo vipulaś ca vistīrṇaś ca saṃsthito 'bhūt /
S04vimkn_u:2212: sā ca parṣat suvarṇavarṇā saṃdṛśyate sma /
S04vimkn_u:2214: kasyedaṃ bhagavan pūrvanimittaṃ yad idam āmrapālīvanam evaṃ vistīrṇaṃ saṃsthitaṃ sarvā ca parṣat suvarṇavarṇā saṃdṛśyate /
S04vimkn_u:2216: eṣa ānanda vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśrīś ca kumārabhūto mahatyā parṣadā parivṛtau tathāgatasyāntikam upasaṃkramiṣyataḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2217: Vkn 10.2 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2219: ime ca mahāsatvās tathāgataṃ drakṣyanti vandiṣyante ca /
S04vimkn_u:2220: āha: gacchāma kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase /
S04vimkn_u:2221: atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tādṛśam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskaroti sma /
S04vimkn_u:2222: yathā tāṃ sarvāvatīṃ parṣadaṃ sārdhaṃ taiḥ siṃhāsanair dakṣiṇe pāṇau pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04vimkn_u:2223: upasaṃkramya tāṃ parṣadaṃ dharaṇitale pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ saptakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtyaikānte 'sthāt /
S04vimkn_u:2224: atha ye te bodhisatvā gandhottamakūṭasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrād āgatāḥ,
S04vimkn_u:2225: te cānye ca tebhyaḥ siṃhāsanebhyo 'vatīrya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhir vanditvaikānte pratyatiṣṭhan /
S04vimkn_u:2226: evaṃ śakrabrahmalokapālā devaputrāś ca bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhir vanditvaikānte pratyatiṣṭhan /
S04vimkn_u:2227: atha sa bhagavāṃs tān bodhisatvān dharmyayā kathaya pratisaṃmodyaivam āha:
S04vimkn_u:2230: Vkn 10.3 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:2231: dṛṣṭaṃ te śāriputra eṣām agrasatvānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ vikrīḍitam /
S04vimkn_u:2233: bhagavān āha: tataḥ kā te saṃjñotpannā /
S04vimkn_u:2235: acintyā saṃjñā me bhagavan tatrodapadyata yathā cintayituṃ tulayituṃ gaṇayituṃ na śaknomi tādṛśīṃ teṣām acintyāṃ kriyāṃ paśyāmi /
S04vimkn_u:2236: Vkn 10.4 athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat: anāghrātapūrvaṃ bhagavan gandham ājighrāmi /
S04vimkn_u:2238: āha: eṣām eva ānanda bodhisatvānāṃ sarvaromakūpebhyo gandhaḥ kāyāt pravāti /
S04vimkn_u:2239: śāriputro 'py āha: asmākam apy āyuṣmann ānanda sarvaromakūpebhya īdṛśo gandhaḥ pravāti /
S04vimkn_u:2242: vimalakīrtinā licchavinā gandhottamakūṭasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrāt sarvagandhasugandhāl lokadhātor bhojanam ānītam /
S04vimkn_u:2243: tad yāvadbhir bhuktaṃ sarveṣām īdṛśo gandhaḥ kāyāt pravāti /
S04vimkn_u:2244: Vkn 10.5 athāyuṣmān ānando vimalakīrtiṃ bodhisatvam evam āha:
S04vimkn_u:2246: āha: yāvad etad bhojanaṃ na pariṇataṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:2247: ānanda āha: kiyaccireṇa punar etad bhojanaṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
S04vimkn_u:2251: Vkn 10.6 yaiś ca bhadantānanda bhikṣubhir anavakrāntaniyāmair etad bhojanaṃ bhuktaṃ teṣām avakrāntaniyāmānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
S04vimkn_u:2252: yaiḥ punar avakrāntaniyāmair bhuktaṃ teṣāṃ nāparimuktacittānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
S04vimkn_u:2253: yair anutpāditabodhicittaiḥ satvaiḥ paribhuktaṃ teṣām utpāditabodhicittānām pariṇaṃsyati /
S04vimkn_u:2254: yair utpāditabodhicittair bhuktaṃ teṣāṃ nāpratilabdhakṣāntikānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
S04vimkn_u:2255: yaiḥ punaḥ pratilabdhakṣāntikair bhuktaṃ teṣām ekajātipratibaddhānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
S04vimkn_u:2256: Vkn 10.7 tadyathāpi nāma bhadantānanda svādur nāma bhaiṣajyam,
S04vimkn_u:2257: tat tāvat kauṣṭhagataṃ na pariṇamati yāvan na sarvagataṃ viṣam apagataṃ bhavati /
S04vimkn_u:2259: evam eva bhadantānanda tāvad eva tad bhojanaṃ na pariṇataṃ bhavati yāvat sarvakleśaviṣaṃ na nirviṣaṃ bhavati /
S04vimkn_u:2261: athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat: buddhakṛtyaṃ bhagavan etad bhojanaṃ karoti /
S04vimkn_u:2262: āha: evam etad ānanda evam etad yathā vadasi /
S04vimkn_u:2263: Vkn 10.8 santy ānanda buddhakṣetrāṇi yeṣu bodhisatvā buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvanti /
S04vimkn_u:2264: santi buddhakṣetrāṇi yeṣu bodhivṛkṣo buddhakṛtyaṃ karoti /
S04vimkn_u:2265: santi buddhakṣetrāṇi yeṣu tathāgatalakṣaṇarūpadarśanaṃ buddhakṛtyaṃ karoti /
S04vimkn_u:2270: santy ānanda buddhakṣetrāṇi tādṛśāni pariśuddhāni yatrānudāhāratāpravyāhāratānirdeśatānabhilāpyatā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ buddhakṛtyaṃ karoti /
S04vimkn_u:2271: Vkn 10.10 na kaścid ānanda īryāpatho na kaścid upabhogo yo buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ satvavinayāya buddhakṛtyaṃ na karoti /
S04vimkn_u:2272: ye cema ānanda catvāro mārāś caturāśītiś ca kleśamukhaśatasahasrāṇi yaiḥ satvāḥ saṃkliśyante,
S04vimkn_u:2273: sarvais tair buddhā bhagavanto buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvanti /
S04vimkn_u:2274_0: Vkn 10.11 idam ānanda sarvabuddhadharmapraveśaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ yatra yatra dharmamukhe
S04vimkn_u:2274_1: praviṣṭo bodhisatvaḥ sarvodāravyūhaguṇasamanvāgateṣu buddhakṣetreṣu nāvalīyate nāvanamati /
S04vimkn_u:2275: sarvodāravyūhaguṇasamanvāgateṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu na kṛṣyati nonnamati /

S04vimkn_u:2278: Vkn 10.12 tadyathā ānanda bhavati buddhakṣetrāṇām aparāparaguṇanānātvam,
S04vimkn_u:2280: evam eva ānanda bhavati tathāgatānaṃ rupakāyanānātvam, na punas tathāgatānām asaṅgajñānanānātvam /
S04vimkn_u:2281_0: Vkn 10.13 samā hy ānanda sarvabuddhā rūpeṇa varṇena tejasā vapuṣā lakṣaṇaiḥ kulamāhātmyena
S04vimkn_u:2281_1: śīlena samādhinā prajñayā vimuktyā vimuktijñānadarśanena balair vaiśāradyair buddhadharmair
S04vimkn_u:2281_2: mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā hitaiṣitayeryayā caryayā pratipadāyuḥpramāṇena dharmadeśanayā
S04vimkn_u:2282: tenocyate samyaksaṃbuddha iti tathāgata iti buddha iti /
S04vimkn_u:2283: eṣām ānanda trayāṇāṃ padānāṃ yo 'rthavistarapadavibhaṅgaḥ sa tvayā kalpasthitikenāpi na sukaraḥ paryavāptum /
S04vimkn_u:2284: trisāhasraparyāpannā apy ānanda satvās tvatsadṛśā bhaveyur agrā bahuśrutānāṃ smṛtidhāriṇīpratilabdhānām,

S04vimkn_u:2286: yad idaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha iti tathāgata iti buddha iti /
S04vimkn_u:2287: evam apramāṇā hy ānanda buddhabodhiḥ, evam acintyaṃ tathāgatānāṃ prajñāpratibhānam /
S04vimkn_u:2288: Vkn 10.14 athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2289: adyāgreṇāhaṃ bhagavan na bhūyo 'gro bahuśrutānām ity ātmānaṃ pratijñāsyāmi /
S04vimkn_u:2290: bhagavān āha: mā tvam ānanda avalīnacittam utpādaya /

S04vimkn_u:2299: ya ima ānanda vimalakīrtinā licchavinaikapūrvabhakte vyūhāḥ saṃdarśitāḥ,
S04vimkn_u:2300: te sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair ṛddhiprāptaiḥ sarvarddhivikurvitaprātihāryaiḥ kalpakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi na śakyāḥ saṃdarśayitum /
S04vimkn_u:2301: Vkn 10.15 atha ye te bodhisatvā bhagavato gandhottamakūṭasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrāt sarvagandhasugandhāl lokadhātor agataḥ,
S04vimkn_u:2304: pratiniḥsṛjāmo vayaṃ bhagavan tān manasikārān yair asmābhir iha buddhakṣetre hīnasaṃjñotpāditā /
S04vimkn_u:2306: acintyo hi bhagavan buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhaviṣayaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2307: upāyakauśalyena satvaparipākāya yathā yathecchanti tathā tathā kṣetravyūhān ādarśayanti /
S04vimkn_u:2308: dehi bhagavan asmabhyaṃ dharmaprābhṛtaṃ yathā vayaṃ tatra sarvagandhasugandhe lokadhātau gatā bhagavantam anusmarema /
S04vimkn_u:2309: Vkn 10.16 bhagavān āha: asti kulaputrāḥ kṣayākṣayo nāma bodhisatvānāṃ vimokṣaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2313: tad bodhisatvena saṃskṛtaṃ ca na kṣapayitavyam, asaṃskṛte ca na pratiṣṭhātavyam /
S04vimkn_u:2365: evaṃ hi kulaputrāḥ etaddharmādhimukto bodhisatvaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ na kṣapayati /
S04vimkn_u:2366: Vkn 10.18 kathaṃ punar asaṃskṛte na pratitiṣṭhate /
