S04vimkn_u:2376: śāntam iti ca pratyavekṣate, na cātyantaśāntim utpādayati /
S04vimkn_u:2377: viviktam iti ca pratyavekṣate, kāyacittena codyujyate /
S04vimkn_u:2378: anālayam iti ca pratyavekṣate, śukladharmālayaṃ ca na vijahāti /
S04vimkn_u:2379: anupādānam iti ca pratyavekṣate, upāttaṃ ca satvānāṃ bhāraṃ vahati /
S04vimkn_u:2380: anāsravam iti ca pratyavekṣate, saṃsārapravṛttiṃ copayāti /
S04vimkn_u:2381: apracāram iti ca pratyavekṣate, pracarati satvaparipākāya /
S04vimkn_u:2382: nairātmyam iti ca pratyavekṣate, satvamahākaruṇāṃ ca notsṛjati /
S04vimkn_u:2383: ajātiṃ ca pratyavekṣate, śrāvakaniyāme ca na patati /
S04vimkn_u:2384: riktam iti ca tuccham iti cāsārakam iti cāsvāmikam iti cāniketam iti ca pratyavekṣate, ariktapuṇyaś
S04vimkn_u:2385: cātucchajñānaś ca paripūrṇasaṃkalpaś ca svayambhūjñānābhiṣiktaś ca svayambhūjñāne cābhiyukto nītārtho buddhavaṃśe pratiṣṭhito bhavati /
S04vimkn_u:2386: evaṃ hi kulaputrāḥ evaṃ dharmādhimukto bodhisatvo 'saṃskṛte na pratitiṣṭhate saṃskṛtaṃ na kṣapayati /
S04vimkn_u:2391: satvaparipācanatvād asaṃskṛte na pratitiṣṭhati, buddhadharmābhilāṣitvāt saṃskṛtaṃ na kṣapayati /
S04vimkn_u:2394: upāyakuśalatvād asaṃskṛte na pratitiṣṭhati, prajñāsunirīkṣitatvāt saṃskṛtaṃ na kṣapayati /
S04vimkn_u:2397: satvārthānubhavanād asaṃskṛte na pratitiṣṭhati, dharmārthasaṃdarśanāt saṃskṛtaṃ na kṣapayati /
S04vimkn_u:2398: kuśalamūlasaṃbhāratvād asaṃskṛte na pratitiṣṭhati, kuśalamūlavāsanatvāt saṃskṛtaṃ na kṣapayati /
S04vimkn_u:2399: praṇidhānaparipūraṇārtham asaṃskṛte na pratitiṣṭhati, apraṇihitatvāt saṃskṛtaṃ na kṣapayati /
S04vimkn_u:2400: āśayapariśuddhatvād asaṃskṛte na pratitiṣṭhati, adhyāśayapariśuddhatvāt saṃskṛtaṃ na kṣapayati /
S04vimkn_u:2409: dṛḍhapratijñayā asaṃskṛte na pratitiṣṭhati, pratijñottāraṇatvāt saṃskṛtaṃ na kṣapayati /
S04vimkn_u:2414: evaṃ hi kulaputrāḥ bodhisatvaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ na kṣapayati, asaṃskṛte na pratitiṣṭhati /
S04vimkn_u:2415: ayam ucyate kṣayākṣayo nāma bodhisatvānāṃ vimokṣaḥ / tatra yuṣmābhiḥ satpuruṣāḥ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2416_0: Vkn 10.20 atha khalu te bodhisatvā imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭā udagra āttamanasaḥ
S04vimkn_u:2416_1: pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā bhagavataḥ pūjākarmaṇe teṣāṃ ca bodhisatvānām asya
S04vimkn_u:2416_2: dharmaparyāyasya pūjākarmaṇe sarvam imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ sarvacūrṇagandhadhupavyūhaiḥ
S04vimkn_u:2416_3: puṣpaiś ca jānumātraṃ saṃchādya bhagavataś ca parṣanmaṇḍalam abhikīrtiṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ
S04vimkn_u:2416_4: pādau śirobhir vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triṣpradakṣiṇīkṛtyodānam udānayanta iha buddhakṣetre
S04vimkn_u:2416_5: 'ntarhitās tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena tatra sarvagandhasugandhe lokadhātau pratyupasthitāḥ // //
S04vimkn_u:2418: Vkn 11.1 atha khalu bhagavān vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2419: yadā tvaṃ kulaputra tathāgatasya darśanakāmo bhavasi,
S04vimkn_u:2421: evam ukte vimalakīrtir licchavir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2432: ṣaḍāyatanānutpannaṃ cakṣuḥpathasamatikrāntaṃ śrotrapathasamatikrāntaṃ ghrāṇapathasamatikrāntaṃ jihvāpathasamatikrāntaṃ kāyapathasamatikrāntaṃ manaḥpathasamatikrāntam,
S04vimkn_u:2443: na lakṣyate na saṃlakṣyate na vilakṣyate,
S04vimkn_u:2503: ya evaṃ paśyanti, te samyak paśyanti /
S04vimkn_u:2504: ye tv anyathā paśyanti, te mithyā paśyanti /
S04vimkn_u:2505: Vkn 11.2 athāyuṣmāñ śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2506: katamasmād bhagavan buddhakṣetrāc cyutau vimalakīrtiḥ kulaputra idaṃ buddhakṣetram āgataḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2507: bhagavān āha: etam eva tvaṃ śāriputra satpuruṣaṃ paripṛccha ḥ kutas tvaṃ cyutvehopapanna iti /
S04vimkn_u:2508: athāyuṣmāñ śāriputro vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat: kutas tvaṃ kulaputra cyutyehopapannaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2509: vimalakīrtir āha: yaḥ sthavireṇa dharmaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ, kaccit tasya dharmasya cyutir upapattir vā /
S04vimkn_u:2510: āha: na tasya dharmasya kācic cyutir upapattir vā /
S04vimkn_u:2512: evam acyutikānām anutpattikānāṃ bhadantaśāriputra sarvadharmāṇāṃ kutas tavaivaṃ bhavati ḥ kutas tvaṃ cyutvehopapanna iti /
S04vimkn_u:2513: yaṃ bhadantaśāriputra nirmitāṃ striyaṃ puruṣaṃ vā pṛccheḥ ḥ kutas tvaṃ cyutvehopapanna iti / sa kiṃ vyākuryāt /
S04vimkn_u:2514: āha: na kulaputra nirmitasya cyutir nopapattiḥ, sa kiṃ vyākariṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:2515: āha: nanu bhadantaśāriputra nirmitasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās tathāgatena nirdiṣṭāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2517: āha: nirmitasvabhāveṣu bhadantaśāriputra sarvadharmeṣu ḥ kutas tvaṃ cyutvehopapanna iti /
S04vimkn_u:2520: tatra bodhisatvaś cyavate, na kuśalamūlābhisaṃskāraṃ kṣapayati /
S04vimkn_u:2522: Vkn 11.3 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:2523: akṣobhyasya śāriputra tathāgatasya sakāśād āgata eṣa kulaputro 'bhiratyā Iokadhātoḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2525: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yad eṣa satpuruṣas tāvatpariśuddhād buddhakṣetrād āgatyehaivaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭe buddhakṣetre 'bhiramate /
S04vimkn_u:2527: tat kiṃ manyase bhadantaśāriputra api nu sūryaraśmayo 'ndhakāreṇa sārdhaṃ ramante /
S04vimkn_u:2528: āha: no hīdaṃ kulaputra, na tayor yogo 'sti / sahodgate hi sūryamaṇḍale sarvaṃ tamo 'payānti /
S04vimkn_u:2529: āha: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ punaḥ sūryo jambūdvīpa udayate /
S04vimkn_u:2532: evam eva śāriputra saṃcintya bodhisatvā apariśuddheṣu buddhakṣetreṣūpapadyante satvānāṃ pariśodhanāya /
S04vimkn_u:2533: na ca kleśaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvasanti, kleśāndhakāraṃ ca vidhamanti sarvasatvānām /
S04vimkn_u:2534: Vkn 11.4 atha sā sarvā parṣat paritṛṣitābhut:
S04vimkn_u:2535: paśyema vayaṃ tam abhiratiṃ lokadhātuṃ taṃ cākṣobhyaṃ tathāgataṃ tāṃś ca bodhisatvāṃs tāṃś ca mahāśrāvakān /
S04vimkn_u:2536: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāḥ sarvasyāḥ parṣadaś cetasa cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2537: darśaya kulaputra asyāḥ parṣadas tām abhiratiṃ lokadhātuṃ taṃ cākṣobhyaṃ tathāgatam /
S04vimkn_u:2539: atha vimalakīrter licchaver etad abhavat: yan nv aham itaś cāsanān nottiṣṭheyam /
S04vimkn_u:2542: akṣobhyaṃ ca tathāgataṃ sāgaropamāyāṃ mahāparṣadi niṣaṇṇaṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānam,
S04vimkn_u:2543: api tāni padmāni yāni daśasu dikṣu buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvanti satvānām,
S04vimkn_u:2544_0: api tāni trīṇi ratnamayāni sopānāni yāni jambūdvīpam upādāya trayastriṃśadbhavanam
S04vimkn_u:2544_1: abhyudgatāni yaiḥ sopānair devās trayastriṃśato jambūdvīpam avataranty akṣobhyaṃ
S04vimkn_u:2544_2: tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāyai paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya jāmbudvīpakāś ca manuṣyās
S04vimkn_u:2545_0: evam apramāṇaguṇasamuditāṃ tām abhiratiṃ lokadhātum apskandham upādāya yāvad akaniṣṭhabhavanaṃ
S04vimkn_u:2545_1: bhārgavacakram iva paricchidya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā puṣpadāmam ivādāyemāṃ lokadhātuṃ praveśayeyam /
S04vimkn_u:2547: Vkn 11.5 atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samādhim samāpannaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:2548: tādṛśaṃ carddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān yas tam abhiratiṃ lokadhatuṃ paricchidya dakṣiṇena pāninā gṛhītvemaṃ sahaṃ lokadhātuṃ praveśayati sma /
S04vimkn_u:2549: Vkn 11.6 tatra ye divyacakṣuṣo 'bhijñāpratilabdhāḥ śrāvakā bodhisatvā devamanuṣyāś ca,
S04vimkn_u:2550: te mahāntam utkrośam utkrośanti sma: knyāmahe bhagavan kriyāmahe sugata /
S04vimkn_u:2552: tān bhagavān vinayanārtham evam āha: na mamātra vṛṣabhitā vimalakīrtinā bodhisatvena kriyamāṇānām /
S04vimkn_u:2553: tatra ye punar anye devamanuṣyāḥ, te na jānanti na paśyanti ḥ kuto vayaṃ kriyāmaha iti /
S04vimkn_u:2554: na hy abhiratyā lokadhātor imaṃ sahaṃ lokadhātuṃ praveśitāyā ūnatvaṃ na pūrṇatvam abhūt /
S04vimkn_u:2555: na cāsya lokadhātor utpīḍo na saṃbādhaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2558: Vkn 11.7 atha bhagavāñ śākyamunis tāṃ sarvāṃ parṣadam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:2559: paśyata mārṣāḥ abhiratiṃ lokadhātum akṣobhyaṃ ca tathāgatam etāṃś ca kṣetravyūhāñ śrāvakavyūhān bodhisatvavyūhāṃś ca /
S04vimkn_u:2562: īdṛśaṃ mārsāḥ buddhakṣetraṃ parigrahītukāmena bodhisatvenākṣobhyasya tathāgatasya bodhisatvacaryāyām anuśikṣitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:2563_1: saṃdarśane 'smin sahe lokadhātau caturdaśānām ayutānāṃ devamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyā anuttarāyāṃ
S04vimkn_u:2564: sarvaiś cābhiratyāṃ lokadhātau praṇidhānam utpāditam upapattaye /
S04vimkn_u:2565: te sarve bhagavatā vyākṛtā abhiratyāṃ lokadhātāv upapattaye /
S04vimkn_u:2566: iti hi vimalakīrtir licchavir yāvān iha sahe lokadhātau satvaparipākaḥ kartavyas taṃ sarvaṃ kṛtvā punar eva tām abhiratiṃ lokadhātuṃ yathasthāne sthāpayamāsa /
S04vimkn_u:2567: Vkn 11.8 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:2568: dṛṣṭā te śāriputra abhiratir lokadhātuḥ sa cākṣobhyas tathagataḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2571: sarvasatvāś cedṛśyarddhyā samanvāgatā bhavantāṃ yādṛśyā vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ kulaputraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2573: ye vayam īdṛśān satpuruṣān labhāmahe darśanāya /
S04vimkn_u:2574: teṣam api satvānāṃ sulabdhā lābhā bhaviṣyanti,
S04vimkn_u:2575: ya etarhi tathāgatasya tiṣṭhato vā parinirvṛtasya vemaṃ dharmaparyāyam antaśaḥ śroṣyanti /
S04vimkn_u:2577_0: ye śrutvādhimokṣyante pratyeṣyanty udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanty
S04vimkn_u:2577_1: adhimokṣyanti pravartayiṣyanti parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti bhāvanāyogam
S04vimkn_u:2578: Vkn 11.9 te dharmaratnanidhānaprāptā bhaviṣyanti, yeṣām ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo hastagato bhaviṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:2579: tathāgatasahāyās te bhaviṣyanti, ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ svādhyāsyante /
S04vimkn_u:2580: dharmasaṃrakṣakās te bhaviṣyanti, ya etaddharmādhimuktānām upasthānaparicaryāṃ kariṣyanti /
S04vimkn_u:2582: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sulikhitaṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyanti satkariṣyanti /
S04vimkn_u:2583: sarvapuṇyaparigṛhītās te bhaviṣyanti, ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyam anumodiṣyante /
S04vimkn_u:2585: ya ito dharmaparyāyād antaśaś catuṣpadikām api gāthāṃ saṃvaram api parebhyo vistareṇa deśayiṣyanti /
S04vimkn_u:2586: tad eva teṣāṃ bhagavan vyākaraṇaṃ yeṣām iha dharmaparyāye kṣāntī rucir matiḥ prekṣā dṛṣṭir adhimuktir muktiś ca bhaviṣyati // //
S04vimkn_u:2588: Vkn 12.1 atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2589: bahuni me bhagavan tathāgatasyāntikān mañjuśriyaś ca kumārabhūtasyāntikād dharmaparyāyaśatasahasrāṇi śrutāni /
S04vimkn_u:2590: na ca me jātv evam acintyavimokṣavikurvitadharmanayapraveśaśrutapūrvo yādṛśa iha dharmaparyāye nirdiṣṭaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2591: Vkn 12.2 niḥsaṃśayaṃ te satvā evaṃ dharmabhājanā bhaviṣyanti,
S04vimkn_u:2592: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyam udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti /
S04vimkn_u:2604: aham api bhagavan teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇām upasthānaparicaryāṃ kariṣyāmi sārdhaṃ sarvaparivāreṇa /
S04vimkn_u:2605: yatra ca grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣv ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ pracariṣyati deśayiṣyati saṃprakāśayiṣyati,
S04vimkn_u:2609: Vkn 12.4 evam ukte bhagavāñ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat: sādhu sādhu devānam indra,
S04vimkn_u:2611: yā devānām indra atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhir iha dharmaparyāya uddiṣṭā /
S04vimkn_u:2612: tasmād iha devendra atītānāgatapratyutpannās tena kulaputreṇa va kuladuhitrā vā buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūjitā bhaviṣyanti,
S04vimkn_u:2613: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyam udgrahīṣyaty antaśaḥ pustakalikhitam api kariṣyati vācayiṣyati likhiṣyati paryavāpsyati /
S04vimkn_u:2614_0: Vkn 12.5 yaś ca punar devendra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S04vimkn_u:2614_1: lokadhātuṃ tathāgatapūrṇaṃ tadyathāpi nāmekṣuvanaṃ vā naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ
S04vimkn_u:2614_2: vaivaṃ śālivanaṃ vā pratipūrṇaṃ kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryān mānayet
S04vimkn_u:2615_0: parinirvṛtānāṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānām ekaikasya tathāgatasya pūjākarmaṇa ekaghanasyāvikopitasya
S04vimkn_u:2615_2: yāvad brahmalokam uccaistvena yaṣṭicchatrapatākābhir udviddhopaśobhitam evaṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ
S04vimkn_u:2616: sa ca tatra kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā pūjāṃ kuryāt sarvapuṣpaiḥ sarvagandhaiḥ sarvadhvajapatākābhiḥ sarvatūryatāḍāvacarasaṃpravāditena pūjāṃ kuryāt,
S04vimkn_u:2617: tat kiṃ manyase devānām indra api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tato nidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt /
S04vimkn_u:2619: nāsya puṇyaskandhasya śakyaḥ paryanto 'dhigantuṃ kalpakoṭīśatasahasrair api /
S04vimkn_u:2620: Vkn 12.6 bhagavān āha: ārocayāmi te devānām indra, prativedaya /
S04vimkn_u:2621: ataḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt,
S04vimkn_u:2622: ya imam acintyavimokṣanirdeśaṃ dharmaparyāyam udgṛhṇīyād dhārayed vācayet paryavāpnuyāt /
S04vimkn_u:2624: dharmanirjātā hi devendra buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ, sā dharmeṇaiva śakyā pūjayitum, nāmiṣeṇa /
S04vimkn_u:2625: tad anenāpi te devendra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam /
S04vimkn_u:2626_0: Vkn 12.7 bhūtapūrvaṃ devānām indra atīte 'dhvany asaṃkhyeye kalpe 'saṃkhyeyatare
S04vimkn_u:2626_1: vipule 'pramāṇe 'cintye yad āsīt tena kālena tena samayena bhaisajyarājo nāma tathāgato
S04vimkn_u:2626_2: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
S04vimkn_u:2626_3: śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān mahāvyūhe lokadhātau viśodhane kalpe /
S04vimkn_u:2627: tasya khalu punar devānām indra bhaiṣajyarājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya viṃśatir antarakalpa āyuḥpramāṇam abhūt /
S04vimkn_u:2630: tena ca devānām indra kālena tena samayena ratnacchatro nāma rājābhūc cakravartī saptaratnasamanvāgataś caturdvīpeśvaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2631: paripūrṇaṃ cāsya putrasahasram abhūc chūrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām /
S04vimkn_u:2632: Vkn 12.8 tena khalu punaḥ samayena rājñā ratnacchatreṇa sa bhagavān bhaiṣajyarājas tathāgataḥ pañcāntarakalpān satkṛtaḥ saparivāraḥ sarvasukhopadhānena /
S04vimkn_u:2633: iti hi devānām indra teṣāṃ pañcānām antarakalpānām atyayena sa rājā ratnacchatras tat putrasahasram āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:2637_0: iti hi devānām indra te rājakumārāḥ pitū rājño ratnacchatrasya ḥ sādhv iti pratiśrutya
S04vimkn_u:2637_1: sarve sahitāḥ samagrā aparān pañcāntarakalpāṃs taṃ bhagavantaṃ bhaiṣajyarājaṃ tathāgataṃ
S04vimkn_u:2638: Vkn 12.9 tataś caiko rājakumāraḥ somacchatro nāma /
S04vimkn_u:2639: tasyaikākino rahogatasyaitad abhūt: asti tv asyāḥ pujāyā anyodāratā viśiṣṭatarā pūjeti /
S04vimkn_u:2640: tasyāntarīkṣād devatā buddhādhiṣṭhānenaivam āha: dharmapūjā satpuruṣa sarvapūjābhyo viśiṣyate /
S04vimkn_u:2641: sa evam āha: katamā punaḥ sā dharmapūjeti /
S04vimkn_u:2643: etam eva tvaṃ satpuruṣa tathāgataṃ bhaiṣajyarājam upasaṃkramya paripṛccha ḥ katamā sā dharmapūjeti /
S04vimkn_u:2645: atha devānām indra sa somacchatro rājakumāro yena bhagavān bhaiṣajyarājas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04vimkn_u:2646: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte 'sthāt /
S04vimkn_u:2647: ekāntasthitaś ca somacchatro rājakumāras taṃ bhagavantaṃ bhaiṣajyarājaṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2651_0: dharmapūjā kulaputra yā tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ gambhīrāṇāṃ gambhīrāvabhāsānāṃ
S04vimkn_u:2651_1: sarvalokapratyanīkānāṃ duravagāhānāṃ durdṛśānāṃ duranubodhānāṃ sūkṣmāṇāṃ nipuṇānāṃ
S04vimkn_u:2654: evaṃrūpāṇāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ yā deśanā saṃprakāśanā dhāraṇā pratyavekṣaṇā saddharmasaṃgrahaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:2656: Vkn 12.12 punar aparaṃ kulaputra dharmapūjā yā dhārmeṣu dharmanidhyaptiḥ,
S04vimkn_u:2679: Vkn 12.13 iti hi devānām indra sa somacchatro rājakumāras tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyarājasya tathāgatasyāntikād imāṃ dharmapūjāṃ śrutvānulomikīṃ dharmakṣāntiṃ pratilabhate sma /
S04vimkn_u:2680: yathāprāvṛtaiś ca vastrābharaṇais taṃ bhagavantaṃ chādayati,
S04vimkn_u:2682: ahaṃ bhagavan utsahe tathāgatasya saddharmaparigrahāya saddharmapūjākaraṇatāyai saddharmaṃ parirakṣitum /
S04vimkn_u:2685: tasya sa tathāgato 'dhyāśayaṃ viditvā vyākṛtavān paścime kāle saddharmanagarapālarakṣāyai /
S04vimkn_u:2686_0: Vkn 12.14 sa khalu punar devānām indra somacchatro rājakumāras tasya tathāgatasya
S04vimkn_u:2686_1: tiṣṭhata eva śraddhayāgārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ sann ārabdhavīryo viharati sma kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu /
S04vimkn_u:2687: tenārabdhavīryeṇa kuśaladharmapratiṣṭhitena na cirāt pañcābhijñā utpāditāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2689: sa tasya bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtasyābhijñādhāraṇībalena paripūrṇān daśāntarakalpāṃs tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyarājasya tathāgatasya pravṛttaṃ dharmacakram anuvartayati sma /
S04vimkn_u:2690: tena khalu punar devānām indra somacchatreṇa bhikṣuṇā saddharmaparigrahābhiyuktena daśakoṭīśatāni satvānām avaivartikāni kṛtāny abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04vimkn_u:2693: Vkn 12.15 syāt khalu punas te devānām indra anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena ratnacchatro nāma rājābhūc cakravartī,
S04vimkn_u:2694: na khalu punas te devānām indra evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04vimkn_u:2696: ratnārciḥ sa tathāgatas tena kālena tena samayena ratnacchatro nāma rājābhūc cakravartī /
S04vimkn_u:2697: yat punas tad rājño ratnacchatrasya putrasahasram abhūt /
S04vimkn_u:2699: yad iha bhadrakalpe paripūrṇaṃ buddhasahasram utpatsyate yataś catvāra utpannāḥ śeṣā utpatsyante,
S04vimkn_u:2702_0: syāt khalu punas te devānām indra evam anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena somacchatro
S04vimkn_u:2702_1: nāma rājakumāro 'bhūd yena tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyarājasya tathāgatasya saddharmaḥ parigṛhīta iti /
S04vimkn_u:2703: na khalu punas ta evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04vimkn_u:2705: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena somacchatro nāma rājakumāro 'bhūvam /
S04vimkn_u:2706: tad anenāpi te devendra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam /
S04vimkn_u:2709: jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā varā pravarā praṇītottarā niruttarākhyāyata iti /
S04vimkn_u:2710: tasmād iha devānām indra dharmapūjayā māṃ pūjayata, mā āmiṣapūjayā /
S04vimkn_u:2712: Vkn 12.16 tatra bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisatvam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:2713: imāṃ te 'haṃ maitreya asaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīsamudānītām anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim anuparīndāmi,
S04vimkn_u:2714: yathema evaṃrūpā dharmaparyāyā yuṣmadadhiṣṭhānena parigraheṇa tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye jambūdvīpe vaistārikā bhaveyuḥ, nāntardhīyeran /
S04vimkn_u:2716: bhaviṣyanti maitreya anāgate 'dhvani kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāś cāvaropitakuśalā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ saṃprasthitāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2717: te 'śravaṇād asya dharmaparyāyasya mā parihāsyanta iti /
S04vimkn_u:2718: imān evaṃrūpān sūtrāntāñ śrutvātīva prema ca prasādaṃ ca pratilapsyante,
S04vimkn_u:2720: teṣāṃ tvaṃ maitreya tathārūpāṇāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ cānurakṣāyā imān evaṃrūpān sūtrāntāṃs tasmin kāle vaistārikān kuryāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2721: Vkn 12.17 dve ime maitreya bodhisatvānāṃ mudre /
S04vimkn_u:2727: ye punar imaṃ maitreya gambhīraṃ sūtrāntam arūpalepaṃ yamakavyatyastanihārapadapuṭaprabhedaṃ pravartayiṣyanti śrosyanty adhimokṣyante vedayiṣyanti,
S04vimkn_u:2729: Vkn 12.18 tatra maitreya dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām ādikarmikā bodhisatvā ātmānaṃ kṣiṇvanti /
S04vimkn_u:2730: na ca gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu nidhyaptiṃ gacchanti /
S04vimkn_u:2734: uttari ca pratikṣipante: ya ete 'smābhiḥ pūrvaṃ na śrutapūrvāḥ kuta ime 'dhunāgatāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2735: ye ca te kulaputrā gambhīradharmasūtrāntadhārakā gambhīradharmabhājanā gambhīradharmadeśayitāraḥ,
S04vimkn_u:2736: tān na sevante na bhajante na paryupāsante,
S04vimkn_u:2738: antarāntarā ca teṣām avarṇam api niścārayanti /
S04vimkn_u:2739: ābhyāṃ maitreya dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām ādikarmikā bodhisatvā ātmānaṃ kṣiṇvanti /
S04vimkn_u:2740: na ca gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu nidhyaptiṃ gacchanti /
S04vimkn_u:2741: Vkn 12.19 dvābhyāṃ maitreya kāraṇābhyāṃ gambhīrādhimuktiko bodhisatva ātmānaṃ kṣiṇoti /
S04vimkn_u:2744: tāṃś cādikarmikān aciracaritān bodhisatvān avamanyate paribhavati na grāhayati na vivecayati nānuśāsti /
S04vimkn_u:2745: tayaiva ca gambhīrādhimuktyā śikṣāyām agauravo bhavati /
S04vimkn_u:2746: lokāmiṣadānena ca satvān anugṛhṇāti, na dharmadānena /
S04vimkn_u:2747: ābhyāṃ maitreya dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ gambhīrādhimuktiko bodhisatva ātmānaṃ kṣiṇoti /
S04vimkn_u:2748: na ca kṣipram anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate /
S04vimkn_u:2749: Vkn 12.20 evam ukte maitreyo bodhisatvo bhagavantam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:2751: vayaṃ bhagavan etāṃś ca doṣān vivarjayiṣyāmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2752: imāṃ ca tathāgatasyāsaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasamudānītām anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ parirakṣiṣyāmo dhārayiṣyāmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2753: teṣāṃ cānāgatānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ bhājanībhūtānām imān evaṃrūpān sūtrāntān hastagatān kariṣyāmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2754_0: smṛtiṃ caiṣām upasaṃhariṣyāmo yayā smṛtyemān evaṃrūpān sūtrāntān rocayiṣyanty udgrahīṣyanti
S04vimkn_u:2754_1: paryavāpsyanti dhārayiṣyanti pravartayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa deśayiṣyanti /
S04vimkn_u:2755: teṣāṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan upastambhaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2756: ye ca khalu punar bhagavan tasmin kāla imān evaṃrupān sūtrāntān rocayiṣyanti pravartayiṣyanti /
S04vimkn_u:2757: veditavyam etad bhagavan maitreyasya bodhisatvasyādhiṣṭhānam iti /
S04vimkn_u:2758: atha bhagavān maitreyasya bodhisatvasya sādhukāram adāt: sādhu sādhu maitreya,
S04vimkn_u:2761: Vkn 12.21 atha te bodhisatvā ekasvareṇa vācam abhāṣanta:
S04vimkn_u:2762: vayam api bhagavan tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasyānyonyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhya āgatyemāṃ tathāgatabuddhabodhiṃ vaistārikīṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2764: Vkn 12.22 atha catvāro mahārājāno bhagavantam etad avocan:
S04vimkn_u:2765: yatra yatra bhagavan grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣv ima evaṃrūpā dharmaparyāyāḥ pracariṣyanti deśayiṣyanti prakāśayiṣyanti,
S04vimkn_u:2766: tatra tatra vayaṃ bhagavan catvāro mahārājāḥ sabalāḥ savāhanāḥ saparivārā dharmaśravaṇāyopasaṃkramiṣyāmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2767: tasya ca dharmabhāṇakasya samantato yojanaśataṃ rakṣāṃ saṃvidhāṣyāmaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:2768: yathā tasya dharmabhāṇakasya na kaścid avatāraprekṣy avatāragaveṣy avatāraṃ lapsyate /
S04vimkn_u:2769: Vkn 12.23 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:2770: udgṛhāṇa tvam ānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhāraya vācaya pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśaya /
S04vimkn_u:2771: āha: udgṛhīto me bhagavan ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:2775: tasmāt tarhi tvam ānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ vimalakīrtinirdeśaṃ yamakapuṭavyatyastanihāram acintyadharmavimokṣaparivartam ity api dhārayemaṃ dharmaparyāyam // //

S04vimkn_u:2779: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat /
S04vimkn_u:2780: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
